author: {'steamid': '76561198821946961', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1659898342}
review: it's a shame that the game was release in this state and the year it was in, the art style, (imo) the characters, the world from Krater. I swear if only they made this game sooner or later with more polish and better decision making and where the game should have headed, it could have been something known by many people, or even have a playerbase. the Idea they were going for Krater was a unique one but they failed to deliver it, I admire the fact that they were trying to keep this IP going by making Bloodsport. but what were they thinking? with League Of Legends already known and played across the whole world, Dota 2, HoN and so on. Krater was an actionRPG but played like an RTS game, it was clunky, it was weird and not satisfying, the reason I tried to play the game was because of how atmospheric it is, how well made the world and the music was. why drop us in a world so well made, make  the rooster and the recruiting make the character feels like they are just a nobody, the classes feels weak and unimportant,  no story for each of them. they should have had a theme. they should have had a history. what they were. where did they come from, and what part do they have to play in the story,  and still this is about Bloodsport, the gameplay feels clunky, the items are bad, you kill people or get nuked and that's it and that's all the game have to offer, they put the story behind, demolished the characters they never even gave a chance to build up. there are so many things good and so many things bad as all thing should be, but still after 11 years i still dont understand how could they mess this up so bad, im giving it a Yes but No, yes because I feel like the Im fighting a losing battle, I bet Fatshark doesnt even remembers about Krater or this game, yes because I yearn for a true apocalyptic top down ARPG in the universe of Krater. No because of whoever sees this, don't buy it it's bad, the community is dead. the playerbase's gone, there's nothing left, but if you want to knock yourselves off, go ahead. but I'd still recommend you Krater.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019490629', 'num_games_owned': 814, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1699031412}
review:
It's a bit clunky, the player base is dead, and it's online only (even for solo play). That being said, it's under $1 on sale and more than enjoyable enough for that price. If you've got friends to play with, then it's quite fun for as long as the servers stay up on a 2015 game with minimal active players...so buyer beware and keep your purchase to the sale price. 

So, anyway, for $1, it's a nice little dystopian hack and slash tower defense game with several character choices, ability and weapon upgrades, and a decent selection of maps to battle on (and a somewhat twisted story to tie it all together).

author: {'steamid': '76561198220470125', 'num_games_owned': 505, 'num_reviews': 230, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1685403344}
review:
极其的单调乏味。。。。 把MOBA游戏做成PVE刷怪防守的塔防游戏。。 怪物重复度极高。。。 
这么好的底子，， 不拿去做PVP ，做一个PVP人机对战也行啊。。。 全部浪费了。。
做那么多地图，每张地图美工都特别棒，游戏的手感，优化，音效都超棒。。。

但是这个玩法太太太太乏味了。。。 怀疑你们做游戏策划和设计还有程序不在一个次元。。。 玩法真的极其无聊。。。。

超级好的底子，超级烂，超级无聊，超级乏味的玩法。。。。。。。。    看来steam上的MOBA游戏，除了DOTA2，就只剩半神了。。。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198201246082', 'num_games_owned': 3232, 'num_reviews': 1499, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1656139707}
review: Bloodsports.TV, kıyamet sonrası İsveç'te geçen işbirlikçi bir kahraman savunma oyunudur. Oyuncular, bir füze silosunu düşman ve patron dalgalarına karşı korumak için arkadaşlarıyla takım kurar. Oyunda, oyuncuların 90'dan fazla öğe ile özelleştirebilecekleri, her biri benzersiz yeteneklere ve oyun tarzlarına sahip çeşitli gladyatörler bulunur. Sekiz arenası ve oyuncu sayısına bağlı olarak ölçeklenen zorluk derecesiyle Bloodsports.TV, hızlı tempolu ve stratejik bir işbirliği deneyimi sunuyor. Oyuncular ayrıca küresel liderlik tablolarında rekabet edebilir, unvanlar ve kilitler elde edebilir ve sonsuz modda veya efsanevi APOCALYMPICS'te kendilerine meydan okuyabilirler. Genel olarak, Bloodsports.TV heyecan verici ve aksiyon dolu bir eşli oyun deneyimi sunuyor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045115146', 'num_games_owned': 407, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 673, 'last_played': 1682230624}

author: {'steamid': '76561197966015988', 'num_games_owned': 1228, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1668580505}
review:
Do you like playing League of Legends, but only really enjoy co-op? Then you are going to love this game.

It's a bunch of MOBA-esque things, like building items, the top-down view and QWER abilities, but instead of going against another team you're fighitng against hordes of mobs. Surprisingly difficult, but an absolute blast to play with other people. Plenty of unlockables as you play on harder difficulties and work your way up the ladders with your favored characters, each of which have different flavors that are all neat in their own way.

And that five pack is just so damn affordable.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987577496', 'num_games_owned': 1011, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 677, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 533, 'last_played': 1661605362}
review:
Игра не покажется вам мертвой, если вы будете играть с друзьями :) 

Отлично подходит, если устали от League of Legends или Dota 2, но все равно хочется играть в MOBA игру. А если брать на скидке - вообще огонь!

author: {'steamid': '76561197988000877', 'num_games_owned': 1605, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1653326988}
review:
Bloodsports.TV isn't a bad game, per se, but ultimately I can't see myself recommending it even ignoring the lack of an online community.

The concept is decent, taking the core gameplay of League of Legends and turning it into a pure cooperative experience. Waves of minions spawn into the map, you kill them for experience and money that you use to buy items, unlock skills and get more powerful. Survive the waves and take out the bosses to win the game.

There's a decent number of maps, a good variety of heroes divided into 4 classes, and functional networking. (I played online with a friend, we were the only 2 people online)

Even thought it all functions, there was a non-stop lack of satisfaction in playing. Alot of the bosses had too much health or had moves that were more annoying than challenging, the waves felt too long, the rewards come too slow for any true feeling of power, and the characters/skills feeling unbalanced or underwhelming. 

None of these are reach the level of "This is a bad game", but just fall short enough that I'd recommend it's competition. Even the goofy story/atmosphere never quite sticks the landing and fails to stand out.

One odd design decision was the an achievement tree, where completing in game achievements with a class gives you permanent upgrades. Rather than making me feel a sense of progression, I almost felt like I was being held back from my full power to pad playtime. (I highly doubt this was the intention, it just feels off)

Ultimately, you NEED to have friends that will play with you for their to be any potential fun because the online is dead. But I'd probably still recommend you look at the alternatives.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971139295', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1706721075}
review:
Fun and a novel premise. PvE horde mode MOBA.

It's actually pretty well executed but whoever was in charge of the progression path needs fired.

Impossible to solo, impossible to find any players not to solo. The two servers I did find were password protected because GADS forbid one should actually play with other people in a co-op multiplayer game.

Still, for 69p on sale, I'd say I've got my money's worth out of the game.

I just feel it could have been more and better.

Not recommended purely because multiplayer requires multi players that are not available and the progression path is largely unachievable, otherwise not a bad title.

If you have mates who are up for it though, I could imagine this being a blast and well worth the asking price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103640309', 'num_games_owned': 1113, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 1370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 943, 'last_played': 1625957850}
review:
My recommendation for this game is primarily a no.

Everything works here for me, I've experienced no crashes or other random issues.
Multiplayer works as expected, even in abysmal 400 ping conditions it didn't bug out.

One annoyance I've had with this that I have no clue if it's standard on mobas is that items and proper skill descriptions can't be viewed outside a match. Wanna study what items are out there? Spend the time you got between waves browsing the shop, time that could be spent on farming the beasts.

The achievements themselves aren't too difficult, however some tasks are on the annoying side, like medics having to revive others (I though the point of having a good medic is not letting people drop), tanks killing mobs at less than 30% hp and dps' killing mobs that attacked someone else.

The main reason for not recommending this is the dead playerbase, like, I find a couple games open per day and that's it.
Unless you already have people willing to get on board with this (5-man team as opposed to the usual 4-man limit that's standard)

I'm having fun and I'll work my way to all the unlocks since I got a few friends to help me here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048074621', 'num_games_owned': 148, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1623523349}
review:
Entertaining and fun game!

Feels a lot like a DoTA or Warcraft III Custom Hero Survival standalone game mixed with a shop heavily inspired by League of Legends.
As a big fan and enjoyer of Custom Hero Survival maps and mods in aforementioned titles, this game genre is something I feel is severely underrated.

PROS
- CHARACTERS - There's 8 different heroes, who all feel viable, and have some identity on their own.
- ITEMS - There's a lot of different items and builds to try out, especially if you're new.
- COOP - You can play up to 5 people in a game, and the game seems pretty well balanced whether you're playing solo or with multiple people, which is very nice!
- DIFFICULTIES - There's a lot of customization in terms of difficulty, in order to let everyone enjoy the game. This is very nice for both newer players and veterans, as you actually get to choose a difficulty that challenges your skill level specifically.
- MAPS - There's multiple maps to play, though I generally only play the first one (the arena), you can try different maps with different strats.

CONS
- PLAYERBASE - There seems to close to no active players, and if you don't want to play with beginners or the same 10 people, you will have to take some friends with you.
- BUGS - The game does sometimes bug, for example, items don't work entirely as intended or aren't specific enough for what they do. Sometimes your character will refuse to attack for some reason, and you'll have to move a bit to fix it.
- GRAMMAR - If you care a lot about grammar, you'll be disappointed with the many typos in the game, but it seems mostly harmless in terms of actual gameplay.
- UPDATES - There seems to be close to no updates in the last few years and seems like the devs have moved on from the game completely.

OVERALL: 6.5/10
It's a pretty fun game that revitalizes the old genre of Custom Hero Survival and lets you have fun trying out new builds and characters with friends or alone. However, the lack of an active player base, lack of updates and typos/bugs leave room for improvement and the low amount of heroes hold the game back.

review:
As a person who hates MOBAs, I could not imagine hating anything more than I do Bloodsports.TV. It is not only very slow paced with an annoying commentator, it doesn't even work in multiplayer! AND THAT'S IF YOU CAN FIND A GAME. We tried. We really. We were going to post a video about it and everything. All we (my friends) were met with was despair. Crash to desktops, every time. I'm actually glad the person we had to kick didn't get to join because he's at least able to run it single player. I would have more fun taking the $2.50 I paid for this FIVE PACK in loose change and throw it at ducks. That's because ducks are bastards, look it up. They deserve it.

I will be trying to get my refund for this game and I will be contacting my lawyer. He's a very good lawyer. LIKE THE BEST. ASK AROUND. EVERYBODY KNOWS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198180969730', 'num_games_owned': 66, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1623278253}
review:
Un muy buen juego, entretenido, e ideal para pasar el rato con tus amigos. Un MOBA PvE que va de superar oleadas protegiendo un cohete de los enemigos. Tiene buenos gráficos y la jugabilidad es buena, tiene ciertas mecánicas parecidas al League of Legends, por lo que las adaptación fue muy rápida. Puntos a mejorar, necesita más campeones o personajes, como los quieran llamar. Puntos negativos, tiene muy pocos jugadores en linea.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057591983', 'num_games_owned': 2752, 'num_reviews': 236, 'playtime_forever': 1275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1624446753}
review:
Игровой процесс 6/10
Графика 6/10
Музыка 5/10

+Ачивки +Карточки -Мало контента -Почти мертвый интернет

Итог 6/10 Можно, но если у вас есть 2-3 друга.

Игра представляет из себя этакую мобу в пве режиме + тавер дефенс. В общем не плохо, но в интернете игроков почти нет, а прокачка персонажей требует дополнительных игроков в команде. А учитывая что та же Лига Легенд намного ярче и там есть всегда с кем поиграть, то смысла особого не вижу зачем вам нужна эта игра.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169044000', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1616106284}
review: Birebir lol mekaniklerine sahip aslında grafikleri problemli değilde harita mantığı yanlış olmuş. Zaten isim seçimi falanda kötü oyunun bloodsportstv nedir yani milyon zilyon tane oyun ismi alınabilecek durumdayken neden biri bu adı seçer :D saçmalık. Kısacası lol oynuyorsan aynı tuşları kullanıyorsun kite falan yapılabiliyor tek başıma oynadım kimse yok zaten kite atarak bossu falan indirdim. Saçma sapan bir dalga sistemi var aslında minyon dalgaları geliyor en son böyle topçu minyon gibi dalgalar geliyor dota ve lol çok oynamış biri olarak bunun geleceğini kaydıran durumun bence haritaları olduğunu düşünüyorum. Aram haritası gibi bir harita olsa tek kişi oynarsın sabaha kadarda itemler falan çok uzun oluşturuluyor orman desen dönülmüyor geleceği olabilecek bir oyunu adamlar yapıp bırakmış saçmalık yani şu oyunu bana verecekler al geliştir güncelle diye en iyi 10 oyun arasına direk kafadan sokarım yazılım mekanikler falan hiç eksiği yok harita ve hero düzenlesek yeter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979975680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 8382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7929, 'last_played': 1698442801}
review:
Full stop, this game is D..E..D Dead. You can find some random games every now and then but there should be no expectation to join random lobbies as the game died off years ago. You should only aim to purchase this title if you have friends that will be playing with you. I do check randomly for games but they are typically locked or just a 10 wave.

That being said you should add this game to your Wishlist and grab the 5 pack bundle when it goes on Sale. I think this game is worth 25 bucks for the 5 pack and it is a steal if your group of friends like these survival wave based games. This game is best enjoyed in groups of 4 or 5 in my opinion. Three is a decent time but you won't be pushing as hard as it is harder to cover map objectives on the harder difficulties.

For pushing the harder difficulty, Apocalympics, the viable Gladiator and Item builds are static. Anyone not going for leader boards all Gladiators are fun to play and kill time with. Games can take up to 2 hours on endless if you are pushing so ensure you slot some time for it. 

Game is missing a bunch of QOL due to age and not being supported but the Announcer and laughs is worth every second in this game. Great game for what it is, lots of fun and really a great basis concept for games like this. ENFOS and other Hero Defense games are my jam and I always find myself bugging the bois to try and get on some Bloodsports.TV

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11207, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1703313890}
review:
This is a multiplayer online-only 2D top down MOBA with a cartoony/cel shaded art theme.   Kill swarms with your friends and protect the missile silo. 

Once more we have a sad case of developers confusing multiplayer for content.  Other players aren't content.  The outcome of such a blunder?  Unless your game goes E-Sports tier critical mass (and very, very few do), it dies hard and fast.  If they added a single player campaign, some content, something to make the game last, it would have a lot more lasting appeal. 

Also, most of the best MOBAs are free to play.   Running with a "me-too, only not as good" option into a crowded arena and charging $10 USD against completely free games is a business plan doomed to failure.  It doesn't matter how great your technical execution is if your business strategy and game conceptualisation is so bad it kills the game before the programmers have even started code.

Edit: For some reason this game came back up again for review and there's now no players and no servers whatsoever.

The "developers" still want your money for a playerless, unplayable, dead game.  Unethical? You bet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120567690', 'num_games_owned': 940, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 4182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4182, 'last_played': 1491513233}
review:
[i]Bloodsports.TV[/i] builds upon popular concepts: a player vs. computer MOBA (multiplayer online battle arena) set in a post-apocalyptic environment, topped with a TV-show setup (that's mainly only represented in the game's trailer). Unfortunately it can't do much with the promising elements: the average gameplay, the low quantity of playable maps and available skills make it feel as if the creators lost interest halfway through development and gave up on adding more content to increase variety (this was probably the reason of the low player base). The result is a functional, but still half-baked co-operative game, that falls short in comparison to other titles within its genre.

According to a lunatic announcer (seen in the trailer - because the game itself lacks any cutscenes whatsoever) bloody arena fights are organized and broadcasted in the post-apocalyptic future. The participants are all sorts of mutant creatures, who are threatened to join the fight or else a nuclear missile is launched targetting their settlements. We play as a gladiator whose job is to protect these missiles against waves of enemies. Again, the idea ends there and even this background info isn't elaborated in the game, it's only mentioned in the trailer(s).

We can choose from 8 characters divided into 4 different classes, with different roles: damage dealer, bullet sponge, crowd control and healer. Each of these characters have different, unique, upgradeable skills, the main problem is there are only [b]4[/b] yes, [b]four[/b] of these per character. As we win matches and fulfill various tasks (called 'Path to Glory'), we gain extra abilites, such as regeneration or increased damage, but nothing else.

The computer controlled enemies come in waves (the number can be set to 4-7-10) with bosses (there are only 3 types of these) from time to time, who possess unique and powerful skills just like us. Their main goal is to destroy the mentioned missile silo, while our job is obviously to protect it at all costs. If a player dies, they respawn at the starting location with low health while the enemy advances without hindrance. Therefore sometimes it is worth luring away groups of enemies, in a losing situation to gain time.
Between waves (and before the match begins) we have 1 minute to purchase equipment (weapons, armor, implants, etc.) from the vendor to prepare ourselves to overcome the increasingly more powerful adversaries (we get money after defeating enemies). We can also kill various map specific critters for extra money during the waves (if we have time for that, it's usually). The amount of equipment may seem all right at first, but after a few games we realize how limited their number is. Same applies to the maps of which we get 8 not so distinguishable medium-sized ones.

The game is still somewhat enjoyable despite all this, but after a few dozens of matches we've seen everything the game has to offer and because of the lack of characters, skills, equipment and maps, the gameplay also lacks variety. And there's nothing left just to play a few more matches with acquaintances to help them earn a certain achievement. All the game required was a few more updates, with added skills and more maps. Instead, the developers completely abandoned the game after the release, which is a rather ignorant attitude considering it's basically a multiplayer only game (it can be played alone to a certain extent, but it's designed for 2-5 co-op players and it's impossible to complete missions later on, as it requires to have multiple characters covering different locations at the same time). Still it's basically bug free and the servers are still up and running at the time of this review, so it can be played with friends. But all this I've listed here is probably the reason why even at its release the player base was remarkably low.

Graphicswise, I'm not a fan of cel shading which the game uses, but I think that's the least of its problems. It also loves to use a soft shade of orange which provides the game a bleak look.
Sounds are totally what one might expect: weapon clashes, screams and forgettable music. The voice and the remarks of the announcer are equally lame and get annoying really fast.

[i]Bloodsports.TV[/i] really is a run-of-the-mill co-op hack and slash game, that offers enjoyment for a while, but gets boring really fast. The option of adding PVP combat, more characters, enemy types, skills, useable items and maps could have made the game a bit more lasting. Besides doing nothing with its premise and lacking anything memorable, it becomes predictable and impossible to replay ever again.

PROS
+ enjoyable gameplay (for a while)
+ interesting concept..

CONS
- ... with which the game does nothing
- offers little variety in everything
- hasn't received any updates since its release

RATING
4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197999659168', 'num_games_owned': 5525, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7096, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6637, 'last_played': 1608434796}
review:
Хотелось бы оставить положительный отзыв об игре. На мой взгляд она этого заслуживает!

Когда то получил ачивку за запуск игры и с целью это исправить, вернее получить все недостающие, собрались с товарищами пройти на 100% эту игру. Ожидали гринд и некоторое однообразие, плюс не имели особого опыта в жанре MOBA, а получили весьма интересную и качественную игру. 

Челлендж здесь в том, что бы пройти так называемый "Path of glory". Ряд испытаний за все классы, с повышением сложности и финальный аккорд убийство ста боссов на максимальной сложности (почти). И я нашел это весьма увлекательным. Возможно те кто пресытился Дотой 2 мое мнение не разделят, но мне лично было интересно ковыряться в способностях и билдах персонажей, изучать противников, пробовать разные стратегии.

Нужна надежная команда из четырех или пяти человек, голосовая связь и около 100 часов времени. Можно играть и меньшим количеством людей, но это соответственно будет дольше и сложнее.

Однозначно рекомендую игру как хорошую PVE кооперативную игру для компании друзей

author: {'steamid': '76561198159387182', 'num_games_owned': 536, 'num_reviews': 285, 'playtime_forever': 3133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2169, 'last_played': 1607759633}
review:
İki dirhem bir çekirdek tartıp düşünesiniz diye yazdık.

- Teknik Hata : Oyun için harcanan zaman ile karşılığında oyunun CRASH ( hatası ) vermesi hoş değil. Örneğin 10. dalgada ( yaklaşık bir saatlik bir sürede ) Pro League teki Boss'u indirmek çok kolay olmadığı gibi tam öldürecekken veya son enerji barını yarıladığınızda oyunun hata vermesinden bahsediyorum. İnsan düşmanına yapmaz böyle bir zulmü.  O yüzden kendinizi ve kalbinizi üzmeyin mesajı vermek istiyorum buradan.

- "Kan Sporları" : O kadar çok oyun ve alternatif var ki; bu oyunun alınması çok şart değil. Zaten günümüz trendleri olan bir çok oyundan sıkıldıysanız en iyisi bilgisayar başından uzaklaşıp; biraz açık havada oksijen almak, bir fincan kahve ile güzel bir kitap okumak veya başkalarına ve kendinize yardımcı olarak geçirmeniz daha iyi olur. Zamanınızı ve paranızı güzel değerlendirin. Sizi bu tarz oyunlara gömen insanlardan da uzak durun derim. Zira, böyle oyunlarla kendine hayatı masa başında zindan etmiş midesi ve beyni nişasta ile yoğurulmuş osuruk ve ter kokan et yığınlarından başka bir şey değiliz.

+ Yine de pozitif bakmalı insan : İmkanınız ve heyecan duyuyorsanız, arkadaşlarınızla oynamayı muhakkak deneyin. Tam bir oyun partisi tarzında ürün. Zor değil ama oyunun işleyişi bakımından strateji kurabilmek için biraz zaman harcamak gerekiyor.  Build sistemi, karakter mekaniği, boss özellikleri ve gelen saldırı dizilimi ve sıklıkları ile harita içi gelir sağlayan beastleri vs. tanımak sonuç itibariyle daha verimli karakter gelişimi ve takım oyunu sağlayacak. Herşey görünüşte güzel. Online oynayanlar bazen oluyor. Server listelemelerinde gözükseler de oyuna giriş sağlayamak mümkün değil bazen. Eğer sizin seviyenize uygun ve takım için serverları şifreli değilse siz de onlara dahil olur oyunu beraber oynar hatta birbirinizle oyun sonrası steam içi tanışabilirsiniz. Türkçe konuşan pek olmuyor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111920922', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1672837122}
review: Игра официально мертва, желающих поиграть фактически нет, а ценник в 400 рубасов за игру "На вечер" никто давать не станет.- Из плюсов - это игра на вечер, для компании, чисто отдохнуть и помесить орды басурманов, которые хотят защитить своё поселение от бомбёжки атомной ракетой.- Из минусов - это игра на вечер, за которую просят деняг. Понимаю что глупо просить сделать F2P, ведь все хотят кушоть, но ни обновлений, ни нововведений, по скинцу за достижение на каждого из персонажей, как то скудно и грустно. А F2P с частично платным контентом, косметикой там (по части было бы профитнее) Ну поминая историю с Battleborn, можно и поминуть эту игру, очень жаль.А так, купил ещё в начале старта, поигрывал в неё иногда, очень нравится, однако покупать ли её или нет решать уже вам. На разок с друзьями покатать, сойдёт, для постоянной игры в соло - увы и ах, не выйдет, для открытия достижений и продвижения дальше в лиге потребуется дофига свободного времени и отсутствие болевого порога ибо проходить придётся много и долго.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021403893', 'num_games_owned': 2604, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 669, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 669, 'last_played': 1565389708}
review:
В данном обзоре я расскажу вам об игре Bloodsports.TV. От разработчиков Toadman Interactive и Fatshark.  Обзор не содержит плагиата и написан целиком и полностью мной, Гвардом.




Игра Bloodsports.TV по жанровой принадлежности относится к играм так называемого MOBA жанра.Эта игра пример того, что могло бы получится если скрестить Mad Max, Fallout и DOTA2. А теперь подробнее...

Сразу отмечу что игра полностью и целиком бесплатна и не имеет вообще никаких вариантов доната.

Первое что мы видим после запуска игры это титульный экран на котором на фоне постройки в стилистике пост апокалипсиса, стоят все наши герои левее огромное табло с очками глобального рейтинга и кучу стандартных опций. Среди которых есть пункт SCOREBOARD где можно посмотреть список лучших игроков и их игровые счета. Если вы станете мастером игры вполне вероятно что, и ваше имя займет там свое место.

Так же стоит обратить внимание на опцию TUTORIAL где нам предложат пройти обучение и это действительно стоит сделать. Так вы освоитесь в игре и её нюансах.

Следующая опция вызывающая интерес это PATH TO GLORY. Тут надо остановиться подробнее. Зайдя в эту опцию мы видим экран с кучей деревьев иконок-ачивок. Хотя в данном случае это не просто ачивки. Наведя курсор на любую из них мы видим описание ачивки, и то что она дает бонусом нашим персонажам. Как правило, это всякие пассивные усиления. Во время боев мы будем специально, а порой просто по удаче выполнять необходимые для открытия этих бонусов-ачивок действия и таким образом открывать их, а потом и апать выше по дереву ачивок получая все более крутые. Очень необычный и интересный аспект игры заставляющий порой очень попотеть ради очередного бонуса получше.

Ну и далее нажимая кнопку Play мы попадаем собственно на экран выбора либо готовых созданных игроками серверов-арен, в том числе и созданные нашими друзьями либо можем создать свою. При выборе создания своей арены мы попадаем на экран настройки арены. Теперь можем выбрать вид арены, условия для нее, задать имя арены и количество игроков.

Далее нас перебрасывает на экран выбора нашего героя а так же те игроки кто составят нам компанию тоже тут же выберут себе героя. И настало время рассказать о бойцах подробнее. Всего их 8 штук по два на каждый класс. Классы делятся на Дамагеров с высочайшим уроном, Танков с потрясающей выживаемостью, Техномагов и класс Поддержки. Теперь о личностях героев:

1) Дамагер киборг по имени Borg MH4 Anders самый высокий дамаг и самая плохая защита.
2) Дамагер человек по имени Gunvald The Mad высокая атака и почти нет защиты, хорошая подвижность.

3) Танк-защитник огромный мутант по имени Lil Erik с самой толстой броней и огромным количеством хп, но хилой атакой. Зато с ядерным супер-ударом по площади отравляющим врагов.
4) Танк-защитник человек-громила по имени Hardy Klanning с приличной броней, но довольно посредственной атакой и частично дамажащими супер-ударами.

5) Техномаг девушка по имение Kati Sagan с хорошим дамагом и спец-способностями вроде гранат, сетей и массового вируса.
6) Техномаг по имени Buzzer Ingholm дамаг приличный и спец-способности с массовым дамагом по площади и прострелом толп врагов разом.

7) Саппорт девушка по имени Luna Stormare имеет какой никакой дамаг и спец способности ракетного удара который нас лечит, а врагов калечит и способности поддержки вроде ускорения атаки.
8) Саппорт девушка по имени Lisbeth имеет фиговый дамаг, но сильнейшие спец способности на лечение союзников.

Так же для каждого персонажа есть по два закрытых скина которые можно открыть, но они меняют только модельку героя.
Надо сказать что все скиллы очень качественно сбалансированы. Играть приятно за каждого героя изучая его способности и стиль игры.

Далее нас кидает собственно на карту, где происходит основное действие игры. Цель большинства режимов — выжить. Либо защитить терминал. Игра не имеет ПВП режима, весь геймплей строится именно на командной работе всех игроков команды для выживания и эффективного убийства мобов. Мобов как правило идут волны, а потом выходит босс.

Перед началом боя всегда доступен магазин как в DOTA2 где мы точно так же покупаем предметы и собираем из них более мощные. Предметов очень много и у всех свои эффекты. Опять же данный момент скопирован с DOTA2 практически 1 в 1.  Монеты на покупку предметов мы зарабатываем с мобов или убийства нейтральных тварюг так же обитающих на аренах.

Графика и звуки на уровне. Все красиво и четко прорисовано, а спецэффекты шикарны. Даже на слабой машине игра будет идти без проблем. Русификацию в игру не завезли, но разобраться в игре не составит труда — даже человеку почти не знакомому с английским.



На этом я заканчиваю свой обзор. Для вас как обычно старался Золотой Дракон Гвард. Всем удачи!

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1569931468}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Когда-то давно я играл в Warcraft 3. Там была возможно играть в разные режимы по интернету с незнакомыми людьми, что я и делал. 90% игроков играло в первую доту, а я играл в другие режимы, типо выстроение башен с партнером, прохождение карты с ультрасильными мобами, защиты арены героями. Про последнее и есть игра BLOODSPORTS.TV. Мы выбираем героя и отправляемся на арену, коих несколько. Одна похожа на МОБУ, где на нас идет толпа монстров, вот только базу врага уничтожать не надо, ведь её нет. Есть арена где из разных углов бегут монстры и надо их убивать. В перерывах магазин под стиль ДОТА 2. Получился эдакий микс. Вот только а этот микс одному играть просто совсем не о чем... Даже не скучно, а тупо смерть будет все время, ведь игра расчитана на компанию из пяти человек. Сервера пустые. Игра платная. Друзей сюда загнать, это еще и копию каждому купить, а она не 1 доллар стоит, а 10. И ведь можно в подобное поиграть бесплатно и где онлайн нормальный... Следовательно зачем покупать? Все что может спасти эту игру от окончательного забвения это её бесплатность и длс на героев и скины или донат внутри. Иначе это просто пустышка выходит которая имеет кучу старых отзывов и продается на скидку. Купите вы её и наврятли когда нибудь запустите. А разрабу и пофиг... Не рекомендую. Без оценки. Просто не рекомендую.

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010134786', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1563321148}
review:
Un moba PvE bastante bueno. Una pena que haya quedado vacío porque tiene geniales ideas, su gameplay es sólido y está todo muy bien estructurado.

A la hora del gameplay como tal, es similar a League Of Legends en cuanto a pasivas, estadísticas del personaje y objetos para comprar, pero el objetivo en Bloodsports radica en soportar oleadas de enemigos seguidos de un boss que cuenta con habilidades especiales.

Se puede jugar single player hasta cierto punto, en niveles más altos se hace complicado soportar las oleadas con un solo personaje. Necesita pasar al Free to Play para remontar, siendo de pago no tiene nada que hacer.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966452671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1563018754}
review:
類似英雄聯盟的守塔遊戲，打錢可以買裝升級，
角色不美型，但其實還蠻好玩的，
只可惜多人模式根本沒人....

遊戲標示可單人模式，但根本無法加入電腦隊友，
造成只能一打多，
我想較高難度的應該直接不用玩了，非攻擊系的角色也不用玩了....
職業進度任務要解也需要隊友，沒多人，免解卡關...
這叫什麼單人模式....
這是我給不推薦的主因。

author: {'steamid': '76561198829187887', 'num_games_owned': 234, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1581712748}

author: {'steamid': '76561198059745288', 'num_games_owned': 9322, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1562155867}
review:
Ich bereue es gerade, dem Spiel nicht schon 2015 eine Chance gegeben zu haben, aber obwohl es damals schon in Bundles einem hinterhergeworfen wurde, hatte es nie eine wirklich große Spielerzahl und ist zum heutigen Zeitpunkt mehr als tot, auch wenn man hin und wieder noch eine andere Lobby findet.

Bloodsports.TV hatte Potenzial, da es wirklich Spaß macht, nur ist es leider alleine mehr oder weniger komplett unspielbar, da frustrierend schwer, weil man beim Tod direkt Game Over hat (anders mit anderen Spielern, bei dem man nach kurzer Zeit respawnt). Bots gibt es leider auch keine.

Es handelt sich hier übrigens um kein MOBA, auch wenn es in anderen Reviews gerne als eines gepriesen wird, es ist pures PvE, auch wenn die Inspiration von Warcraft 3 und MOBAs offenkundig ist, anhand dem Gameplay.

review: I wish there was more to this game. I'd like to be able to control more than one of the heroes since there isn't many people playing, and if they are, they're usually in a password game.. This is my kinda game tho, i love it, just wish there were more to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975988182', 'num_games_owned': 684, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1553375668}
review:
Bloodsports.TV is very similar to League of legends 
... just less complex
... on significantly smaller maps 
... and the possibility to play PvP 
... or PvE on about 10 maps where you defend your missile silo against waves of enemies including Bosses. 

Pro:
+ Very easy to learn.
+ PvE possible (we don't like PvP)
+ 10 different maps
+ Enemy numbers per wave definable (3+Boss, 7+2 Bosses, 10 with 3 Bosses, endless)
+ Classes and characters really play differently (though holy trinity).
+ Exceptionally cheap (bought 4 player pack on sale for less than 5 € I think)
+ Stable, no crashes or technical issues.

Neutral:
o Graphics similar to LoL
o Sound and music were... adequate.
o No idea how good PVP is.

Con:
- No new and suprising or creative mechanics.
- PvE becomes boring at some point (we didn't try PvP)

Summary:
We (4 players) had a lot of co-op fun for at least 3 hours. 
Really worth buying when on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198832735925', 'num_games_owned': 1860, 'num_reviews': 368, 'playtime_forever': 9500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7829, 'last_played': 1549052169}
review:
¿Te gusta jugar a League of Legends, pero solo disfrutas realmente del modo cooperativo? Entonces te va a encantar este juego.
Es un montón de cosas de MOBA, como la construcción de elementos, la vista de arriba hacia abajo y las habilidades QWER, pero en lugar de enfrentarte a otro equipo, estás luchando contra hordas de mobs. Sorprendentemente difícil, pero una explosión absoluta para jugar con otras personas. Un montón de desbloqueables mientras juegas en las dificultades más difíciles y asciendes en las escaleras con tus personajes favoritos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198340519957', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1892, 'last_played': 1536302292}
review:
生存防守类游戏,Not塔防,NotMOBA，玩的人很少也没有更新
北京时间21:00之后游戏人数较多
游戏开始后也可以加入，人数越多精英怪越多
房间延迟看主机所在地区，主机一走这一局游戏就没了,500ping以下的房间都还可以接受
基本阵容1T+1奶
装备属性和效果还是一目了然的，也就那几个出装套路
吸血装可以给技能吸血，然而吸血居然是概率性的
TAB看战绩&ping值,看谁在划水
游戏目的只为了刷最高分排行榜&成就
切屏的BUG可以在设置里将“全屏”改为“无边框全屏”即可
免费领的也就这样吧，挂完卡稍微玩了会A了

author: {'steamid': '76561198028783640', 'num_games_owned': 2162, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1651642912}
review:
一開遊戲就直接跳出成就的獨立遊戲，直接給負評！



獨立遊戲最垃圾的就是：

一、直接跳出成就。
你以為有多少人會去浪費時間玩三流的獨立作品，
設計一個成就陷阱，會讓你們這些小品製作人覺得很爽是嗎！

二、連線模式。
大廠的連線都能說關就關了，
你們這些小品學人家搞什麼連線，
伺服器一關，遊戲、成就等各方面就變半殘了。

三、新增成就。
許多人玩小品主要是解「全成就」，
誰要浪費生命玩你們這種低水準的作品！
有的竟然還過陣子冷不防新增成就，
一看到全成就達成數少1時，
還得回頭去垃圾山找出哪款垃圾遊戲新增了成就，
這樣很有趣嗎？你當STEAM的垃圾遊戲是花半天就能找得完的嗎！

STEAM什麼不多，就是垃圾最多！



更別說STEAM系統都是以撈錢為主，
把成就系統搞到跟垃圾沒兩樣，
就連辦活動也腦殘至極，
竟然會設計成需要大家集體作弊才能達成！
STEAM承辦活動人員的腦袋是裝什麼的，
難不成是跟LV5帶頭的一樣，沒讀過什麼書，
只會寫程式，RPG的文筆竟爛到讓人都替你感到丟臉，
卻還大言不慚想做出跟FF、DQ一樣的作品。



這社會就是可悲，
一向是劣幣逐良幣，
如果是SONY在PC獨大，
至少成就系統能正常發展。

可惜卻是被唯利是圖的商人罷佔，
然後放任垃圾堆積，
等垃圾積到一定程度才會去清，
遊戲數、成就數等玩家的權益就這樣被直接無視！

author: {'steamid': '76561198013088688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1526866472}
review:
A fun and silly little PVE-MOBA coop game that's worth fiddling around with for a whopping $1.99 when it hits the sale bin.

Definitely want to rush to unlock the harder modes and play with friends, else it's too easy and boring.

Kind of wish there was a higher budget, more fleshed out mimic of this game on the horizon.

Needs: more classes, more interesting abilities, better character and ability control (feels janky).

author: {'steamid': '76561198182736759', 'num_games_owned': 452, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1532363506}
review: Lustiges kleines Coop-Game ! Mehr aber auch nicht. Es ist ein gelungenes Spiel, aber schon nach kurzer Spielzeit, fallen einem viele Ideen ein, die das Spiel noch besser gemacht hätten. Zbs. Tägliche Quests, Mehr Champions, die Basen selbst Optimieren zu können (mit Einheiten und/oder Turret upgrades) usw. Man kann es sich im Sale für 2,50€ ruhig kaufen und hat ein kleines gutes Coop Game, dennoch ist es Schade, dass dieses Spiel leider aufgegeben/vergessen wurde. Die Schwierigkeitsstufen sind vielseitig und es findet sich für jeden Casuel bis hin zu Pro Player den richtigen Grad. Ein hoher wiederspielwert ist mit dem Endless Modus zu erwarten. Aber 10€ wären es mir nicht Wert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155689200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1532697358}

Leider aber nicht mehr spielbar, da es keine bots gibt und ich keine server finde, falls es überhaupt noch spieler für das Spiel gibt. Das spiel hätte viel mehr aufmerksamkeit verdient.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067002281', 'num_games_owned': 1066, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 7387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7387, 'last_played': 1530409724}
review:
A year or so back I purchased the Fatshark Bundle for myself and a friend. At first glance all the games looked entertaining and the reviews were good. Letting the game run for cards it unlocked one achievement and in doing so dropped my overall percentage score, it is because of this that I have played this game a lot sooner than I was planning.

Before I get into the details of why you shouldn't purchase this game let me tell you what's good about it first. The game itself looks good and runs smoothly at 60fps. The gladiators/arena remind me of Borderlands with it's wise cracking commentator and post apocalyptic atmosphere. It shares the same universe as Krater, so if you wish to find out more details about this world you can do so if you please. Your character's upgrade system although improperly balanced is fairly fleshed out, allowing for a wide variety of customisation. It's got achievements, trading cards, a cloud save, and cooperative play, all of which work perfectly.

Now, for it's shortcomings. The arenas are all more or less the same thing only fashioned into different shapes. You have only a small selection of eight heroes to choose from and roughly fourteen different enemies to kill including optional enemies, bosses, and their spawns. The majority of the skill tree will have to be boosted with a friend because there is no one online and the people who are online will have locked their lobbies, so only their friends can play. The leaderboards are riddled with hackers due to the developers abandoning this game for their newer more popular titles. The upper levels of it's hardest difficulty are impossible to complete even for veterans of the game unless they are completed in a group of four or more, yet another example of poor optimisation.

Much like the MMO or current Battle Royale craze Fatshark tried to cash in on the MOBA phase and lost. The atmosphere was nice, the graphics were alright, and the combat was interesting enough, but nothing really stuck out when faced against the other more well developed games such as LoL or Dota 2. In the end Bloodsport.TV is just an egg which the developers cracked before making their omelette which is Vermintide.

review: Прикольная ПвЕ игра. 4 класса, по 2 персонажа на каждую роль (ближник, танк, стрелок, хил). Интересная механика и скиллы как героев, так и боссов с элитными мобами. author: {'steamid': '76561198171541951', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1662620128}
review:
Toadman Interactive nos trae a PC Bloodsports.tv, un entretenido título cooperativo que sigue la estela de los MOBA (tan de moda en la actualidad) pero nos ofrece a la vez unos enfrentamientos divertidos y dinámicos. Sangre, misiles, y muchos clicks en el ratón para defender lo que es nuestro… ¿Dispone Bloodsports.tv de las cualidades necesarias para triunfar en un catálogo ya abarrotado de juegos del estilo? Bueno, eso, como siempre, depende de cada jugador. Analicemos aquí sus pros y contras.

“Bloodsports.tv”, los jugadores veteranos no pueden evitar imaginarse unn juego violento, como Blood Bowl.
Tal vez Manhunt, o Madworld.
En este caso, nos equivocamos. que nos “Bloodsports.tv” aporta un verdadero sentido televisivo Con los constantes comentaristas durante la partida. 
No obstante, el contenido del juego va más allá, tanto en orientación como en el (escaso) argumento que ofrece. 

Aunque el término argumento se queda un poco grande. No hay historia: es una lucha a muerte entre equipos, si bien la finalidad consiste en proteger un misil que será lanzado tras cada oleada de enemigos, y es que esa es una de las características de este juego: los enemigos aparecen en las citadas (y violentas) oleadas, como si del modo Horda de Gears of War se tratase. Entrarán por una zona del escenario y la finalidad de nuestro equipo no es otra que proteger el proyectil que, si los derrotamos, será disparado contra su base. Hasta aquí nada nos tiene por qué quitar la idea de que nos encontramos ante un juego cargado de violencia… y sí, hay sangre. Pero ya podéis olvidar la idea de un entorno o personajes creíbles: para empezar, como en todo MOBA, los personajes son bastante mecánicos y parcos en movimientos, que no van mucho más allá de las animaciones de desplazarse y zurrar, o en todo caso alguna postura de ataque especial. Y algo más: el aspecto gráfico parece beber irremisiblemente del cell shading y la estética de Borderlands, eso sí, mucho menos detallado.

EL VEREDICTO
¿Te animás a proteger nuestro misil? Como vés, Bloodsports.TV no se separa mucho de lo visto en otros juegos disponibles en el catálogo de PC, pero también es cierto que lo que hace, lo cumple muy bien. No tiene un apartado gráfico puntero, su jugabilidad no es novedosa en especial… pero a fin de cuentas, es divertido, artísticamente muy positivo y en definitiva, un buen título dentro del catálogo de PC, y a un precio asequible. Si a alguien le apetece echar unas partidas con sus amigos, y se considera entusiasta del género, Bloodsports.TV es la apuesta segura de este mes. ¡Que empiece el espectáculo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011665771', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 4671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1804, 'last_played': 1686341542}
review:
I enjoy the game, it has a way of being playable at least partly single player, but to get past certain hurdles you'll need at least two good team mates. It's the sort of game where you need friends most of the time and while I don't love the game, I don't hate it either.

The game has a PvE MOBA feel over it, there are 4 classes, Tanks, Slayers, Medics and Crowd Controllers, each class has 2 characters each who focuses on one play style often which can be Solo healer, Tanking DPS etc.
This is further done by what I feel is the worst part about any MOBA, items, you can get better by buying items and such and each item often has it's special things it gives you to help in a certain area of fighting, but at the second half of the harder levels you can so easily lose the chance to get money to get items to get better just because you don't land the finishing blow, say, because you're all dead or a bot does the last damage.
The game has a very slow progression and a lot of the progress is just simply "Kill X amount of enemies with Crits and all slayers start with more crit chance" etc, which in the end, makes up for a lot of early game advantage, and makes the difference between struggling in the Pro League and wiping the Master League.

The community is really low as it's a really old game by now, but from time to time you can find a server or two up and maybe get to spend a few hours having fun with someone.

The game does seem to have some issues, such as the typical lazy "Move and stop to attack if you get in range of enemies then move again" command is really off with some characters, like the "mobile turret" character, if you move she will lose her turret mobility, and sometimes she will not autofire. There also appears to be a bug where your progress gets flushed, happened to me just the other day, and it's not even funny how tragic it is.

All in all, a decent game if you got friends who like Mobas but hate PvP and enjoy a grinding but rewarding co-op experience. Sadly Fatshark is suckling on the Warhammer teat so don't even try to ask for updates if you ask me, the game is far too unpopular to get any real attention.

review:
Oyunun içeriği güzel 8 farklı karakter olan bir savunma oyunu.Dalgalara karşı canlı kalmamız gerekiyor.Karakterler:2tank 2 can basan 2nişancı 2 de yakıncı ve hasarcı olan türden.Biraz lol u anımsattı.B ile base atma felan.Eğer oynayacak arkaşlarıınız varsa uzun süre oynanır.Ama tek kişi uzun sure sarmıyor,campaing felan da yok ayrıca zorluk seviyesini de arttıramayınca sıkılıyorsun.(Zorluk arttrılıyor ama tek olunca geçmek imkansız.).Sadece 1 adam gördüm online o da odayı 1kişilik kurmuş mecbur tek oynuyorum.
Güzel müzik,grafik iyi ama adam yok sadece oynayacak.Bu yüzden öneremiyeceğim oyunu.
7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198041425002', 'num_games_owned': 2119, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1499982831}
review:
I am not fan of this type of games but I decided to try.

I see many complain about dead community and how hard it is to find someone to play with.

I played only one match. First there were two of us and one player joined after few minutes.

This was my first time playing and I could see other two players were eperienced.

We played almost 2 hours. I made lots of mistakes and kudos for two other players for putting up with me. 

But I guess they didnt had any choice as it is hard to find someone to play with (according to reviews).

UPDATE: I decide to play more. I create my own server for 5 players. Though I started alone quickly there were 5 of us in arena.It seems it is not that hard to find someone to play with.

Game by itself is fun though for me it becomes boring when I purchase best equipment and maximize upgrades. Seeing same arena for more than 1 hour wave after waves of same enemies is not my kind of game.

But for gamers which like this gameplay I think they will be satisfied. 

I will give negative review just because developers abondoned this game so quickly. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6fjqWE38cB8&list=PLPD9a7_D0dFroegCAPfEfj_-SkpJPU6As

author: {'steamid': '76561197986779655', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 607, 'last_played': 1486929966}
review: If you get it for 1 euro its a fine coop for one or two evenings. Only 4 heroes to play with, all maps have the same bosses and monsters, so every map is essentially the same. They could have made a great game if they just had added more content, maybe even a story mode instead of arena only. Just kinda pisses me off that the game is well made, except that after 20 minutes of gameplay you have already seen the whole game. The difficulty modes do not matter, it's either too easy or it becomes a battle of abusing game AI.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006563527', 'num_games_owned': 3471, 'num_reviews': 909, 'playtime_forever': 857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1565274053}
review:
Von den Machern von War of the Roses und Warhammer: Vermintide ist auch Bloodsports.TV. Das Game ist ein MOBA, nur eben ein PvE-MOBA. Stellt Euch ein ganz klassisches MOBA vor wie LoL oder Dota etc. packt da ne Cellshading Optik drüber, reduziert die eigenen KI-Minions auf ne handvoll Roboter bei den Türmen und ersetzt das Gegnerteam durch Wellen von mutierten postapokalyptischen Irren wie sie aus Borderlands oder Fallout entsprungen sein könnten. Macht Laune und ist ganz witzig gemacht. Nur: a) wie ein "normales" MOBA ziehen sich die Gefechte recht lang hin und b) sind nicht gerade viele Spieler online, also holt Euch Freunde fürs Koop-Schnetzeln dazu.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AfFPFWID5g0

author: {'steamid': '76561198051975962', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1480528340}
review:
とりあえずセールで安かったので5packを買って知り合いに配って遊んでみた感想


起動するといきなり難易度がどうとか言われるがとりあえず簡単な方を選ぶんだ
そうするとチュートリアルをやるか？的なことを言われるがめんどくさいからスキップするんだ

そうするとLoLのマスタリーツリーみたいなものが表示されるがこれは熟練度スキル的なもので
最初は何もいじれないのでスルーしろよ



そうするとここでやっとメインメニューに放り出されるわけだが、
いざサーバーを見ると誰もいねえ！！　過疎中の過疎だ！！　

フレンドを誘って正解だったようだな...


ハクスラでわちゃわちゃするゲームかと思いきやLeagueOfLegendsのCo-opモードだった！！
無料で遊べるLoLがあるのになんで買ったんだこんなもの！！と怒りを心に抑えつつ
ＵＩといい　ミニマップは右上でそれ以外はまんまLoL　
敵を倒してお金を稼いだらＢボタンでショップのおっちゃんの前にリコールだ！！

アイテムはどのキャラを選択してもAll itemsのタブから好きなものが買える　カスタムの幅が広いぞ！！
キャラはアサシン、タンク、マークスマン(AP)、メディック(supporter)の4種類で2体ずついるから8体から気にいった奴を選べ

重複OKだから全員メディックのキャラにしてビルドをガチガチにすることもできる（それが楽しいのかどうかは知らん）

ステージは10種類くらいある　ウェーブの設定も4waveから10waveまで設定できて難易度も細かく設定できる

でだ、これだけ細かくマッチが設定できるのには理由がある　さっきいったように
このゲームにはマスタリーツリーみたいなのがある

それで難易度をあげれば稼げるお金が増える　ウェーブ数をあげればその分敵が多くなるが被ダメが増えたりHPが多かったりと
デメリットもある　しかもマスタリースキルをあげるのに最高難易度をクリアしろとかいう
内容のミッションもあったりしてかなり鬼畜

自分にあった難易度でコツコツレベルを上げる必要があったり
ステージやウェーブによってボスの種類も変わるからそれにあわせたビルドも
考えなきゃいけなかったりで一見なんだただのパクリゲーやんけとか思ってやってるとすごく火傷するゲームだ





しまりが悪いが特に書きたいことはもうないのでこの辺で終わるぞ

協力すればなんとかなるとか思っても所詮過疎　一緒にやる人がいなけりゃクリアすらできない　
非リアの俺らは買わなくてもいいゲームだ　さあ早くブラウザバックしろ

もっといいゲームはいくらでもある


できれば過疎ってないのを買うんだな！！！！ba-ka

author: {'steamid': '76561198039501991', 'num_games_owned': 696, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 6183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3223, 'last_played': 1567442072}
review:
[h1]Bloodsports.tv[/h1]
[b]The co-op MOBA-like hero defense game[b]

If that doesn't sounds good to you, don't get this game.
Also don't buy it at full price. Why? Because amount of people playing this game is low.
And I mean [i]really low[/i]

So, what's good about this game?
It's nice, at least I like it, and that few people who still play it ( shout out to them for still playing this game, not that there are many of you )

If you have a friend or two or 4,  all of you like co-op games, all of you play MOBA games, then grab a 5-pack and give this game a shot.
At -75% it's just a bit more than 1 Euro per copy if you buy 5-pack and I'd say it's worth it, even if i by myself got it from some bundle.

[b]At the end I'm just gonna say: Try it. Maybe it's not the greatest game you will play, but it's a solid one, that I enjoy and recommend[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198217475552', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 834, 'last_played': 1473639440}
review:
Nettes Spiel für Zwischendurch da man ohne großen Zeiteinsatz erste Erfolge erreichen kann. Durch die relativ kurzen Runden hat man auch den "nur noch eine Runde" Effekt. Nachteilig ist das es wohl relativ wenig Spieler gibt und man daher Server / Channels oft nur schwer vollbekommt.

Die Grafik ist angemessen, die Spielmechanik sehr ausgewogen. Frustriende Elemente findet man selten, jedoch auch wenig überraschendes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077242222', 'num_games_owned': 2468, 'num_reviews': 444, 'playtime_forever': 878, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1534872618}
review: The game is repetitive, I don't mind that though since I like these types of games. It's top down similar to Diablo and Dota, you choose from 4 types of characters - tank, damage dealer, disabler and healer. Each has different characters to them as well with different abilities. There are bunch of arenas much like tower defense games with different layouts but this is not a tower defense game. You have to defend the main core from the waves of enemies trying to get to it. There is something similar to skill tree or path where you unlock power ups for the characters by fulfilling tasks. You need those power ups to play on higher difficulties. The main issues with the game is that there are almost no people playing it, you might be able to find some in the forums though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032585269', 'num_games_owned': 340, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 430, 'last_played': 1469919695}
review:
Overall, a great concept for a game, carried over from similar games on Warcraft III. You control a single hero among a group of heroes defending a missle silo against waves of enemies. Buy items, Kill enemies, Repeat. And that might sound like a casual dismissal of the genre of hero defense, but it's not. Personally, I love the hero defense genre. Bloodsports has an interesting aethetic and a unique setting for the hero defense genre, but ultimately it falls flat and just doesn't have the replayability that a game like this could, and should, have.

Characters - There are 4 classes, and only 8 characters (2 for each class). Which isn't a terrible thing on it's own, but there isn't enough variation and interesting abilities to keep things interesting. In a game focused on controlling your hero and slaughtering waves of enemies, you want your abilities to feel impactful and great using them, but that doesn't really happen playing Bloodsports.tv. Your abilities scale up as you level them, with increased damage and lower cooldowns, but there's nothing added that makes it feel like you're getting stronger, since your enemies are scaling with you. Having level 1 of most abilities feels the same as levels 2, 3, 4 etc.. I don't think the character design is either terrible or great, but in a game so dependent on controlling your hero, having a lackluster hero experience is definitely a big minus. Couple that with the absurd progression system, and games can seem more of a grind and a hassle than a fun experience.

Items - There are a good number of items in the game, but the build path for most characters seem fairly linear. There are a few deviations and customizations you can make, but if you're looking for the optimal build, it's probably the same in nearly all situations. And that takes out a lot of the strategy or planning, and is another factor leading to your character, and game experience, very cookie-cutter and lacking originality.

Enemies - I really like the diversity of enemies. There aren't tons of varieties (maybe like 10?), but they all serve a bit of a niche, and depending on their combination it can really cause you to alter your playstyle. This on the fly decision making to adapt to the spawned enemies is something the rest of the game lacks, a sense of strategy and coordination between players. Some enemies heal, some enemies are very mobile, some are stealthy and go for your back line of characters, almost all have channeled abilities which can be interrupted (and it feels great when you do interrupt them, and when you don't or are unable to, you feel like it's something you could account for in the future. I think the enemy design is probably one of the high points of the game.

Multiplayer - Fortunately, I primarily play this game with friends. I've played it briefly solo, but the maps are pretty clearly designed to be played with multiple people. And the community is essentially dead. If you are interested in playing this game, you'll have a much better time if you can find 2 or  3 or 4 friends to play with, but don't expect to find a single other player in this ghost town of a game.

Overall - I really would love to be able to recommend this game and sink hundreds of hours into it. But the replayability and the overall experience just won't allow me to. If you can rouse up 4 friends, I'm sure you could have fun for a few hours. But ultimately, the game is lacking a lot in terms of depth. I would call this a very promising base for an incredible game, but it's missing too much and has too much that needs to be improved.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063048114', 'num_games_owned': 2657, 'num_reviews': 540, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1494105057}
review:
There is only one mode in Bloodsports.TV: co-op. You can run through the tutorial or set up a match for just yourself to test things out, but there are no campaign or competitive matches. All that’s left is straight up five-player, drop-in/drop-out, cooperative action. You’ll start each match (assuming you’re hosting) by choosing from one of the game’s six maps, setting the game difficulty, and finally selecting how many waves of enemies you feel like facing.

There is enough variance that players should be able to find a hero that suits their particular play style. Each class (and to a degree each hero) also has their own set of challenges to complete - called the “Path to Glory” - that apply stat bonuses to that class. This gives players a little extra incentive to try out all available classes and characters.

There are some issues with the game - like the look and feel of the UI, crucial stats getting lost amidst a cluster of health bars, and the occasional drag of repetition - that stick out from time to time, but these are quickly forgotten once you clear a difficult wave or kill an especially tough boss.

After all, nothing beats that elation you feel when you win a hard-fought battle with a group of friends!

7/10

review: 第一次写评测，勿喷，之所以写是因为，这个游戏很好玩，操作类是英雄联盟，属于合作竞技，一起对抗强大的怪兽，你需要肉盾，你需要加血的，你需要输出位置，你也需要控制，最多5人一起玩，总共4类英雄，每类英雄有不同技能的英雄，目前我只玩了输出位置，主要是玩的人不多，一直单刷，这也是我写这评测的目的，增家人气，希望这游戏能继续开发更新，画面和bgm都不错，玩起来很有爽感，还可以秀的飞起。。。ps这绝对不是站撸游戏。。。选择合适的装备，灵活的走位剁掉怪兽的技能。。。当然也可以用技能躲。。。很不错的游戏，绝对值，搞基必备，新寝室5黑

author: {'steamid': '76561198057252542', 'num_games_owned': 4535, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1470523763}
review:
This game is seriously great fun, I play competitive Heroes of the Storm quite a lot and was looking for something casual to play in co-op with my friends when we weren't in a competitive mood - this game hit all the right spots.

However someway through a co-op game each of us start lagging out and dropping from the session like flies (despite all having decent internet connections), trying to re-join mid-session just greets you with an endless loading screen while still being able to hear the action as if you're in the game.

We tried for a good 2 hours and couldn't all stay in a game together for more than 10 minutes. Which really saddened me, especially now that I've since found out the game has basically been abandoned so we have no chance of getting that particular bug fixed.

As a single player game, it probably works flawlessly - but try to play with your friends and what feels like an excellently unique and fun co-op moba-brawler, will start to feel like a complete waste of your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004603031', 'num_games_owned': 1412, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1110, 'last_played': 1440277389}
review:
TL;DR: You'd like to play a DOTA-like game without the stress and rage of PVP gaming with some friends? This game is for you. (Not worth for solo though).
=============

Meet Bloodsports, a futuristic take on ancient Roma's gladiators. You play a character among 8, each with a set of class skills geared towards one of the classic MMO roles (tanker, striker, healer, crowd-controller) to take on hoards of enemies and defend a nuclear missile (your core). 

Game is classic in mechanics but very good in implementing them. Each class has its own feeling and variety of tactics, combining skills and items to bring out powerful abilities. 

Obviously the game is made to be played with friends. It's nice to play a few hours in solo but gets repetitive quickly. With friends, it's basically up to your own love for the genre. 

As for realization, nothing to criticize: the art is nice and develops an identity to the universe, music and off-voice contribute weel to the cynical atmosphere, and I have no memory of any bug.

Although it's no more updated, unfortunately, game is still worth its full price. You'll net between 10 and 40 hours of fun depending on your taste for the genre and how many friends you play with.
 When on sales, it's a premium pick if you have at least 2 other friends interested.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970181510', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 597, 'last_played': 1453912571}
review: just found this game and i must say that it sure is awesome even on single play ... finally found a game from this type of genre that is actually fun and that even i can mostly understand how its played the best way  .. so if like me you find DOTA too hard  and full of morons but still love the genre then this might be for you

author: {'steamid': '76561198084810748', 'num_games_owned': 499, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 873, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 808, 'last_played': 1526421501}
review:
Um bom jogo no estilo clássico de Defesa de Torre.

Pros
Variados modos de jogo e cenários
Ranking de classificação de jogadores
Personagens bem elaborados divididos em 4 classes
Conquistas bem elaboradas e interessantes, embora um pouco confusas
Poderes e itens bem feitos com o diferencial dos implantes q nao ocupam espaço no inventario

Cons
Repetitivo como quase todo moba
Mecanica simples e mt similar aos joguinhos amadores do Warcraft III 
História (embora admito q seja um opinião bem pessoal nao gostei da ideia de disparar misseis contra aldeias)



Um jogo bem acabado, completo porem simples. Nao presenciei nenhum bug ainda, otimo para ser jogado casualmente e q deve ser mt mais interessante se jogado com amigos. 
Nota: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198025825689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1097, 'last_played': 1573994661}
review:
Swedish humor in its most swedish way.
Anybody who appreciates swenglish announcers and jokes understood mainly by swedes will love this game.
Everybody else should play it anyway, because it is sweeeet.

Imagine Enfo's, back in the days of WarCraft 3 UMS.
Now take that, and make it AWESOME.
Although there are a shortage of classes compared to enfo's, I really think it's better to have a good core than a multitude of shit nobody will understand anyway.
Each class has an option of being more of the class, i.e. a tank/tank or a dps/tank. Or a healer/healer or a dps/healer, which is quite enjoyable if you're tired of always being the one that gets stuck with a certain role.

On a minor note, the channeling times for the enemies are a bit broken and unfortunately mean timing dodges are a bit of a challenge.

All in all, an awesome game.

review: Отличный фоллаутовский дизайн с героями, вдохновленными вархаммеровской орочьей эстетикой, удачно выделяющийся серьезностью по сравнению с казуальным внешним видом популярных моба-игр, разные классы героев с проработанными наборами скиллов, качественно сделанный магазин и достаточно требовательный от игрока динамичный геймплей против слегка недоработанной системы поощрения за пройденные матчи (имеются только достижения, получаемые градациями, не хватает дополнительного уровня развития аккаунта игрока, более плавного).

author: {'steamid': '76561198206468105', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 2991, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 673, 'last_played': 1449189110}
review:
Bloodsports.TV is a title that has undoubtedly positive and satisfactory, which, however, are strongly influenced by the presence of users online to play with. If you have available a party of friends or at least four other people with whom to coordinate, then, the title Fatshark will offer a gaming experience that does not shine for originality or particularly innovative ideas, but can still give some fun.
When is missing the presence of players online, as happened often during our tests, then the title becomes an exercise in single player of value relatively modest, showing side by a repetition of the bottom. Taking into account the various positive and negative aspects highlighted, therefore, the judgment result is in any case discreet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067608206', 'num_games_owned': 4450, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 858, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 858, 'last_played': 1441321164}
review:
Ah! Nada como ser um Gladiador num futuro pós-apocalíptico, e trucidar camponeses que lutam para salvar seus lares, tudo isso ao vivo num reality show sangrento, não?

Bloodsports.TV é um jogo do estilo Hero Defense, com mecânicas extremamente similares aos dos famosos MOBAs queridinhos de todos. A diferença é que é 100% cooperativo, para até 5 jogadores online.

O jogo imita MOBA em muitos sentidos, inclusive em relação à progressão por partida: toda vez você pegará um novo herói, no nível 1, sem dinheiro ou itens, e irá pouco a pouco progredindo até o fim da partida.

Durante a partida, a progressão se resume em experiência, que é utilizado para passar de nível e liberar habilidades, e dinheiro, que é utilizado para adquirir novos itens.

Antes de entrar numa partida, você deverá escolher seu personagem. Ao todo, são 8 personagens, distribuidos entre 4 classes especializadas.

Ao passar de nível, seu personagem ganhará um pouco de dano, e você receberá um ponto adicional para gastar numa das habilidades do personagem.

Um diferencial do jogo é a ausência de habilidades totalmente passivas: toda habilidade terá um uso ativo, e algumas delas também possuirá um uso passivo, descrito na habilidade do personagem.

Assim como nos MOBAs, para ganhar dinheiro, você deve desferir o último golpe (last hit) nos inimigos.

O jogo conta também com o clássico sistema de combinação de itens, onde você junta 2 ou mais itens e forma um mais poderoso.

Quando você formar seus 6 itens finais, ainda poderá torrar a grana que ganhar adquirindo implantes na loja. Esses itens não ocupam lugar no inventário, e garantirão um bônus permanente ao seu personagem.

Além de todas essas progressões durante a partida, o jogo conta também com um sistema de progressão persistente chamado Path to Glory. O sistema é representado por uma árvore, onde em cada parte dela está presente uma conquista a ser liberada.

Ao completar uma tarefa, você destrancará algum bônus para suas próximas partidas, ou acesso a algum conteúdo restrito, bem como permitindo que você possa destrancar a conquistas acima da que liberou.

Ao final de cada fase, seu desempenho será quantificado, resultando numa pontuação final. Essa pontução é multiplicada por um fator baseado na dificuldade selecionada.

No quesito jogabilidade, nada muito diferente dos MOBAs tradicionais, como League of Legends ou Dota 2: a grande maioria do controle do personagem é feito através do mouse, com o botão direito dando ordens de movimento ao personagem.

Em Bloodsports.TV, o objetivo é impedir que os inimigos destruam o Silo de Mísseis, derrotando as ondas de oponentes que surgem nos pontos de nascimento dos inimigos.

Cada onda é composta por pequenas levas de inimigos, que podem surgir de diferentes pontos do mapa, conforme o mapa escolhido. Certas ondas terão um chefe, que virá logo no começo da onda.

Para auxiliar na defesa do silo, você contará com torres de posto avançado, locais que ao contrário do que o nome sugere, não atacam, apenas geram BoxBots, pequenos robôs que ajudam os Gladiadores como bucha de canhão na defesa.

Sempre que acontece algo importante na partida, o jogo ativa uma área na interface que mostra uma outra câmera em uma porção da sua tela, com um texto abaixo e usualmente seguido de uma fala do narrador.

O jogo tem gráficos medianos para os padrões atuais: nada excessivamente detalhado, nem efeitos exagerados.

Talvez pelo próprio estilo visual do jogo, que é um misto de Krater (por estar situado no mesmo universo), e Borderlands (pelos conceitos de personagens, e pelo uso de Cel Shading ao redor dos personagens também).

A trilha sonora é um pouco psicodélica, e encaixa-se muito bem no pano de fundo do jogo. Os sons de combate são bem colocados, nada se sobressai muito e tudo é bem encaixado.

Bloodsports.TV certamente deve preferencialmente ser jogado online, permitindo até 5 jogadores para defender uma partida.

Ao clicar para jogar, o jogo irá automaticamente mostrar a lista de salas criadas, onde você pode além de ver suas informações de andamento e opções, efetuar uma filtragem bem básica.

Entrando na sala, você cairá no lobby dela, onde poderá escolher seu personagem e verificar os jogadores que estão na partida e seus personagens, e ali já poderá conversar com os jogadores que estão dentro da partida, utilizando a caixa de chat no canto inferior direito.

Ao entrar numa partida em andamento, você ganhará ouro e experiência extras para que possa sair da base e ter uma força proporcional ao desafio da onda atual.

Pra quem curtia mapas de Hero Defense no Warcraft 3, não tem o que discutir: Bloodsports.TV é uma tentativa de transformar mapa custom num jogo próprio!

Pra quem curte MOBAs também e gostaria de tentar uma abordagem diferente, mais cooperativa, sem sombra de dúvidas, também é uma boa pedida!

O grande trunfo, na minha opinião, é a inclusão de drop-in, tornando assim as partidas mais amistosas e com menos chances de um poder estragar a diversão dos outros.

Infelizmente, o jogo tem seus problemas: em especial, a falta de atualizações reduz rapidamente o interesse dos jogadores.

Em consequência disso, o número de jogadores é sempre baixo, o que para um jogo cooperativo online é fatal.

Dessa forma, só posso recomendar o jogo caso ele venha a ter alguma atualização que desperte o número de jogadores online, ou caso você tenha amigos e possa dividir um 5 Pack!

Análise completa em http://www.poepra2.com.br/analise/bloodsports-tv/

author: {'steamid': '76561198043609914', 'num_games_owned': 3556, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1440512871}
review:
Note: This game was reviewed using a key sent by the developer.

Bloodsports.TV is a moba type game where the main goal is to survive with your team mates but will you want to play it ?

Bloodsports. TV has a very simple concept. It play's like a online battle arena, but the goal is not to destroy the base of other players. This game is a wave based survival game where the main goal is to protect a rocket and fight until the game is over.

Graphics are pretty awesome. The cell shaded look is really nice and some of the character models look really nice. Overall there's not much to talk about the art style.

The soundtrack is really good as it's composed by Mega Drive (Also did Hotline Miami). The sound effects in game though aren't that good. Some of the voice acting is incredibly bad.

The game has co op but there's a big problem. The game is already dead so if you do buy it be prepared to either get friends who play the game or play solo which get's boring really quickly. 

You can choose how long do you want the matches to be. But the best decision is to make the matches four waves long as it doesn't last too long and it's just the right amount of time. 

I didn't encounter any bugs while playing the game. There is a minor problem where sometimes my character wouldn't do a spell even though I had enough mana.

Overall Bloodsports.TV is a really good idea and the execution is really good, but the game is dead and playing Solo isn't that fun.  I do suggest trying the game if you have friends who play it or you don't mind playing solo. I give Bloodsports.TV a 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197994127301', 'num_games_owned': 1899, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 646, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 646, 'last_played': 1433584745}
