author: {'steamid': '76561197985668557', 'num_games_owned': 1514, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 3347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3205, 'last_played': 1474149504}
review:
It pains me to write this review, but since all of the reviews are from when the game first released I need to say something about the game.

First, the game's online community is dead. The average is about 18 concurrent players online. For a game that is multiplayer centric a community as dead as this is a death sentence out the gate.
Second, the game is now abandoned. The developers gave us one update then jumped ship and moved onto Vermintide.
Now if you're like me and got a pack of the game to play with friends you won't need to worry about other players joining you, but you will run into what made the community die off.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list][*]The game's setting and characters are pretty neat. It takes the characters of Krater and places them in an arena where they fight for others enjoyment.
[*]The announcer is pretty funny in short bursts, after awhile he'll really start to grate on your nerves. (Seriously, after you hear "Will the gladiator be able to put that item to good use?" for the 50th time it gets a bit annoying.) Luckily you can turn off the announcer in the settings if you get tired of him.
[*]The core gameplay is that of any hero defense game, so it's solid and pretty fun.
[*]Different wave length, I believe they're 3 waves, 5 waves, 8 waves, and endless, which allows you to play for as long, or short, as you want.[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list][*]The progression system. While it's nice to have a progression system, how it was done was completely assinine. To put it into simple terms, you need to do certain things in game; however, they're often things that you would need to grind out as opposed to getting them through normal play through. (For example: the Medicus needs to heal some below 10% health 300 times. If you're letting teammates get that low you're a bad healer.)
I've been pretty vocal on both the developer's forums and the Steam forums about how this could be changed, but not once has any of it been addressed by the developers.
[*]Lack of content. The game has 8 maps and 8 characters, 2 characters of each class. 
Now there's only 3 maps I can think of that get played frequently. Pharma Initiative is the most played due it being the easiest to defend, Abandoned Mine is sometimes played since you can easily farm all the neutrals every round, and Rooftop Rumble is used when going for achievement farming as you can glitch out the AI and make it walk back and forth and never attack anything. So if you play the game chances are you're either going to play on Pharma or Mines, and due to how the games progression system works you're probably going to continuously play the same character over and over.
[*]Bugs that have continued to go unpatched.
[*]Odd design decisions. From the missile silo, what you're protecting, being able to be attacked despite previous defenses still in place, to one of the healers only forms of damage actively pushing enemies out of other heroes skills there's a lot that seems really amateur.
[*]Honestly, I have many more nitpicks, but I've not played the game in some time so I can't remember them off the top of my head.[/list]


In short, the game is fun for awhile if you have a group to play with, but you should NEVER pick this up alone and hope to find people in game. 

That being said though, the Dota 2 hero defense custom games are just as fun as this game and have better developer response, assuming you speak the same language as the map creator. Not to mention that they're free compared to the $25 you'd need to play this with a group of friends.

[i]Update on 2/26/2016 was only to fix formatting and grammar. Also added in the devs officially abandoning the game.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198047864195', 'num_games_owned': 1130, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1075, 'last_played': 1535415896}
review:
Запах крови, отрубленные конечности и кричащие от боли противники...

Обычно так себе представляют гладиаторские бои. Именно такими они оформлены и в этой игре. Сделанная в стиле MOBA Bloodsport.TV предлагает нам не сразиться с командой противника, а выдерживать жестокие нападения противника под контролем компьютера. Получается что-то вроде Доты, но враги - словно локусты из Horde mode в Gears of War.

Графика не особо привлекательная, но и не отталкивает. Как раз подходит для игры в стиле пост-апокалипсиса. 

Геймплей увлекает. Соберите себе команду друзей, запаситесь колой и пряниками и рубите врагов на ленты... или будте порублены на куски беспощадными боссами. В дивизионах повыше игра становится прямо таки Dark Souls в мире MOBA. Цена не кусается, так что приобретайте и наслаждайтесь.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086917932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1439596816}
review:
I went into this expecting another run of the mill MOBA and, while that wasn’t far off, there was a bit of a twist on the genre. Bloodsports.TV is a multiplayer online battle arena game from Fatshark and Toadman Interactive. Let’s get rocking.

The Good

By now you’ve all played either League of Legends, or DOTA, or Smite, etc. Or, you live under a rock. My first experience in the MOBA world was Guardians of Middle-Earth and I anticipated every other MOBA I played after that would be, essentially, very similar. While B.TV is similar to your run of the mill MOBA, the object of the game is different and a lot less stressful. Rather than fighting the enemy team, you’re working with your team to defend your base against waves of enemies. It’s a blast.

I love the artwork in this game. I’ve been a fan of it ever since i first played Krater, another great addition to the gaming world from Fatshark. It’s like a less serious, Fallout style post-apocalyptic wasteland full of Scandinavians. What’s not to love? And the character designs are just fantastic.

The music is great, the controls are simple, the items are creative and fun, and the horde-style gameplay will keep you coming back for more.

The Bad

There wasn’t really anything that turned me off to the game while I was playing. We can just move along.

The Meh

Because it’s not one of the bigger name MOBAs, the community is pretty small and all but dead as far as I can tell. Don’t let that deter you though if you’re really wanting to play. It’s a fun game nonetheless.

Also, you have to pay to get the game itself, unlike other MOBAs.

Verdict: Yea

Bloodsports.TV is a solid MOBA game and, if you’re a fan of Krater, you’re going to like it. If it goes on sale, don’t hesitate to pick it up and give it a try. As always, thanks for reading.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146300490', 'num_games_owned': 1525, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 9818, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9267, 'last_played': 1561640665}
review:
This is a very fun and addictive MOBA-Coop Game that really deserves more love.

[h1] Pros: [/h1] 
[list]
    [*]Great Gameplay
    [*]Lots of Fun
    [*]Highly Addictive
    [*]Purely PVE
    [*]4 Classes with 2 Gladiators each, having their own unique skills
    [*]Many difficulties to choose from - 17 in total. 4 Main difficulties. Amateur, Pro, Master and APOCALYMPICS.
    [*]Unlocking Achievements also yield some small Bonuses for specific Classes
[/list]

[h1] Cons: [/h1] 
[list]
    [*]Too few Players - you literaly know each person you play with. Feels like 10 people only play it.
    [*]Repetetive
    [*]Too few maps IMO. 8 in total - 2 are mainly played.
    [*]Achievement Hunter unfriendly: Achievements (Challenges) are unlocked once you got the required 1 before it and they are too tough to unlock and sometimes takes very long.
    [*]No PVP.
[/list]

[h1] Final Verdict: 9/10 [/h1] 

Or to put it in another way: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jAvq26K2v0c

author: {'steamid': '76561198030027926', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1438454651}
review:
Much like Aliens CM: Bug Hunt or the Lord of the Rings MOBA - there is only so far you can get in this game solo.
The game is 'ok' but there's much better to see and do before I die so I wouldn't be wasting my time seeking out MP games; especially when there are so many deeper ones.

Feels very much like this should've been a 'survival' mode for Krater.

Would I recommend this? Only if you had friends to play it with and not for more than $5

author: {'steamid': '76561197966282979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1428146751}
review:
Much like Krater launching alongside, and drawing unfavourable comparisons with, Diablo 3, Bloodsports.TV will be compared endlessly to DOTA 2 and other MOBA heavyweights. That’s fine on a mechanical level, and fine as an entry for players who have MOBAs as a touchstone, but it does a disservice to what Bloodsports.TV does well. Bloodsports.TV will need word of mouth from experienced players to sell it and save it from lazy comparisons.

It’s good. It’s fun and it’s a welcome return to a universe that could well have slipped into obscurity. Given that Bloodsports.TV is the price of a sandwich and a coffee it’s an easy sell, give it a chance and it could well develop all the intricacies that I was hoping for as well.

http://www.permanent-beta.net/reviews-1/2015/4/7/bloodsportstv

author: {'steamid': '76561198024412131', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 2374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2374, 'last_played': 1432632934}
review:
Bloodsport.tv tries to be LoL but for PVE players, focusing on high scores, unlockables, and strong core gameplay elements. For the most part it suceeds! The game is very easy to pick up for MOBA veterant and not too hard on newcommers. The core gameplay is focused on map, location and witchever hero/champ your team is composed off. If you think you may enjoy a more PVE type of moba, go ahead! the dedicated community seem more on the small size but ive seem plenty of nice people out there. Have fun!

-Lost

author: {'steamid': '76561198081783302', 'num_games_owned': 3178, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 542, 'last_played': 1616606509}
review:
Merhaba Türk dostlar,

Oyunumuz Bloodsports.TV   kıyamet öncesi mekanlarda geçen 5 kişi multiplayer olarak oynanabilen gladyatör-arena oyunu dur diyebiliriz.Oyun Fatshark & Toadmann Interactive (ikisi de stockholm merkezli bağımsız geliştirici) tarafından geliştirilmiş ve Steam üzerinden dağıtımı yapılıyor.

Oyunda gladyatörümüzü seçip arenada köylerini savunmak için gelen waveleri yoketmemiz gerekiyor.Oyunda 3 dalga-5 dalga 10 dalga ve endless dalga  seçeneklerini ve zorluk olarak amatör-usta-cehennem gibi zorlukları seçebiliyoruz. Her wave'in sonunda yenilenlerin köyüne bir adet füze yollanıyor otomatik olarak.Haliyle biz de bunun üzerine goldlarımızı kazanıyoruz ve digital adam görünümlü sarı ışıktan kısaca marketimizden itemlarımızı alıyoruz.

Oyunda 6 tane eşya slotumuz bulunmakta.Her slotu doldurduğunuzda implant dediğimiz her seferinde 1000 altını verdikten sonra istediğimiz kadar alabildiğimiz geliştirme seçenekleri mevcut.Mesela kimi %2 crit chance + %5 crit damage veriyor kimi tech power + energy regeneration veriyor.

Market kısmını geçersek oyunumuzda 4 farklı gladyatör sınıfı var ve her sınıfın altında 2 faklı karakter bulunmakta.Her karakterin de 1 adet skini bulunmakta.Bunları da path of glory dediğimiz yoldaki görevleri tamamlayarak açıyoruz.Bu görevleri tamamlamak o sınıfta oynadığımız karakterlere ek özellikler de kazandırıyor.

Gladyatörler 4 sınıfa  ayrılıyor.

1)Slayer(The Damage Dealer)------->[b]Karakterleri[/b]   Borg MH4(saf hasar verici) ve Gunvald the Mad (debuffer assassin)

2)Brusier(The Tank)----------------->[b]Karakterleri[/b]  Lil' Erik (taunter) ve Hardy Klanning (debuffer ve taunter)

3)Regulator(The Crowd Controller)---->[b]Karakterleri[/b] Kati Sagan(taunt+debuff) ve Buzzer Ingholm (AOE Damagger)

4)Medikus(The Healer) ----------------->[b]Karakterleri[/b]  Luna Stormare (Öldürdüğün kadar iyileştir) ve Lisbeth (buffın kadar iyileştir)

Hepsinin kendine has buildleri var.Mesela Slayerlara Crit +damage item kasmalı,Brusierlara deflect + damage kasmalı ,regulatorlere tech +power ve healcilere tech + energy kasmalısınız.

Oynanışta farenizi ve klavyenizin Q W E R tuşlarını kullanıyorsunuz o kadar.Bu nedenle Lol,Strife,Dota 2 vb. oyunları oynayanlar oynarken zorluk çekmeyecektir.Grafik bakımından zaten hep aynı mekanda dolaştığınız için pek birşey beklemeyin.Ama buram buram Borderlands grafiği kokuyor onu da söylemem lazım.

Sonuç olarak oyun arkadaşlarınızla veya tek olarak girebileceğiniz,serverlarında problem bulunmayan,zaman geçirmek için yi bir seçenek.İndirimde bulursanız veya bundlelarda görürseniz çekinmeden alabilirsiniz.Okuduğunuz için teşekkürler.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967529438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1433640643}
review:
I expect games with action in the shop tags to require some skill - aim, reflexes, cunning.  This title kinda runs on auto at times.  I went to the bathrooom to take a shit and I won a round.    I could see enjoying it if you like point & click RPGs like path of exile, but I don't. 

Still, the production values are decent, and it's cohesive.  It's a tough call, but I'm going NO.

review: Bloodsports.TV是一款团队合作防守基地的游戏。有玩过魔兽争霸RPG防守图或是MOBA类游戏的同学上手肯定非常快，因为我觉得这款游戏就像是把魔兽争霸RPG防守图和MOBA合成系统融合在一起一样。现阶段这款游戏最大的缺点就是模式、元素单一，玩家可能玩个几小时就厌倦了。而且我觉得这款游戏如果仅仅以更新地图来维持人气的话，是不会长久的，也不能给游戏带来实质性的发展，最根本的还是要增加新的玩法，否则最后只能沦为+1产物。

author: {'steamid': '76561198018175951', 'num_games_owned': 609, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 724, 'last_played': 1435543323}
review:
Full disclosure, I've never played a "MOBA" game such as LOL or DOTA so I can't compare Bloodsports.tv to them; however, I have unfortunately wasted way too many hours over the years playing various MMOs that I can compare the raiding aspect to.

While it can be played solo I wouldn't recommend it as you'll miss out on over all the coop fun. The best part of this game is assembling a team, picking your roles (classes), and going to battle with AI. The developers have managed to remove all the grinding BS of MMOs introduce and give us just distilled experience of raiding. You bring your best the table, you fight, you win or you fail.

You want to go toe to toe with the big bad boss, play a Tank. Smack that dude in the face, piss him off, and let your teammates drain his health while you keep his aggression on you.

Feel the need to help? Play a healer. Keep the tank alive as he grapples with the boss & heal the ancillary classes as they get aggro (when they shouldn't).

Feel like dishing out some pain? Play direct damage, run around all psycho like and shred the enemies just try not to get noticed by too many lest they all get together and smash you before the healer gets to you.

Want to spread chaos, play Crowd Control. Help the tank smash the boss, and keep the minions at bay.

[b]CONS[/b]
[list]
[*] crowd control class doesn't play like a traditional crowd control but more like another dps class with a stun added in to their repertoire. 
[*] tutorial doesn't explain the shop/item purchasing system well at all
[*] documentation for the game seems non-existent and doesn't explain shop/item purchasing system well
[/list]

[b]PROS[/b]
[list]
[*] Excellent COOP experience
[*] Great game mechanics
[*] Visually appealing game aesthetic (graphics/UI)
[*] No grinding, you can drop right into the action (once you know what you're doing)
[*] Because its PVE/AI you don't have to deal with toxic/hate filled voice chat
[/list]

Steam operates in a binary recommend it yes or no, but if it scored this I'd rate the game 90% the lack of documentation/explanation of store/class/builds is a large knock in my book.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001494272', 'num_games_owned': 1309, 'num_reviews': 335, 'playtime_forever': 908, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 571, 'last_played': 1455990030}
review:
May 21, 2015
It's cheesy and odd, but I'm not alone in enjoying Bloodsports. MOBA without the PvP competitive toxicity meets MMO raiding and bosses without the loot treadmill. The adjusting AI means solo players can do well, and the community is decent. 10USD may be high, but the game is quite enjoyable.

I had been watching the game before launch, and picked it up in a bundle. The voice acting and visuals were a bit cringy, but I've grown to like them as the gameplay hooked me. It's easy to jump on, launch a server, and smash waves solo. Eventually the server will pick up some players, and you'll find the game really improves with teamwork. Several servers are active but full or password-protected, and netcode bugs will lead to rare disconnects. I'm enjoying the gameplay and progression system, and I'd recommend looking into Bloodsports on a sale or with a group of friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999935168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1190, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1435983271}
review:
Wow what to say about this game. I love it just as much as I do the game before it, Krater, in which this game uses the Krater universe and characters and they bring all their cool skills with them and it is fun as hell. I made a online match and people joined and we all had fun going 10 waves as the Medikus, the tank, support, and dps, fighting off waves of monsters to not destroy our missile silo. The best game I can compare it to is Heroes of the Storm with no minions. You protect towers and ultimately your silo from defeat by AI controlled minions, by yourself or with friends. You can level up your skills while playinng and can buy items from the shop, all just like other familiar moba games. This doesn't really have a ton of pussy-footing around trying not to get hit or seen as your minions rank up exp for you. It doesn't work that way. Your coins come from your kills only. It's either you by yourself playing SP fighting hordes of monsters, or play with a friend or get someone online to help even the score and play moba style for some good fun. The teamwork pays off and wins rounds so use what you have to benefit the team and you should be okay. The only issue is that it is basically a mp game and barely anyone plays it so it won't last much longer probably. But even so, I still find a few games each time I boot it up. However sometimes they are all too high lvl so I make my own and sometimes ppl join, sometimes not. Depends on the time and the day.

I love Krater's universe and this is a nice extension. Graphics look awesome, so do effects. Sound is awesome and music is great if a bit repetitive. Game controls really well also. One great universe worth making more games off of for sure. Krater 2 would be real nice.

8/10 fun stuff

author: {'steamid': '76561198027894996', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1431306182}
review:
Interesting game, and it brings the interesting approach of being purely PVE witch in a way makes it a nice intro to hero games kind of game. When it works it's not bad, but the characters aren't exactly memorable, nor customizable.

The other issue remains is that sometimes you just can't access a friend's game, you might get stuck there on the splash load screen for seemingly no ryme or reason, and if it does it once, expect it to do it the next five times you try. For now I give it a thumbs up, but if I find that happens too regularly, there's just not enough here to topple the likes of the already well established league of legends. With that you just probably have an often harsh community to contend with from my understanding.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123288775', 'num_games_owned': 3061, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1457775517}
review:
初玩简单评测：
QWER式的技能设定，B键回城。这种游戏设定操作感比较强，所以才能不会腻吧。
第一次玩了医疗兵中的第一个角色，Q是一个直线技能，W是一个向前方扇形区域攻击，E是向某个方向突进，可以用来躲技能，R是向某个方向发射一枚区域伤害的导弹，由于是英语所以技能中关于治疗的那部分我没看懂。。。至于出装同样是由于英语问题，装备的被动技能搞不太懂，只能看懂装备的基本属性。由于电脑太烂，带这个游戏比较勉强，降低画质没感觉对提高帧数有什么帮助。。。总之只能玩锁定视角，解除锁定的话画面跟不上鼠标移动。随便加别人的房间的话基本延迟感人（毕竟可能加到外国人的房间），我还以为我的技能是延时技能。。结果自己建房后根本就是延迟的锅。。
3/12追加评测
用笔记本玩这个游戏的话默认使用集成显卡，所以要先改成用高性能显卡运行。优化其实还可以吧。
没什么人玩，一般只有两三个房间的样子，不过自己单人游戏也不错

author: {'steamid': '76561198046495652', 'num_games_owned': 3274, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 2175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2175, 'last_played': 1443374764}
review:
[h1]Review: Bloodsports.TV[/h1]
 
Simply put: Borderlands meets MOBA, but in a good and satisfying way. Choose your Gladiator and protect a Missile Silo from outlaws. Survive the wave and crush their village. Sounds fun? Read further my friend.
 
I have tried to play MOBAs - but either I am too bad or i don’t like the fact that beginners get many beatings. Most of them occur in the chat, written by pros not wanting to share their wisdom. Back to Bloodsports. I had wishlisted this game when i first saw it. I liked the look, I liked the action. Most of all I liked the fact that it is totally PvE. Their is no PvP yet but the developers already mentioned if the community really wants it, Player Vs Player will make its appearance too.
 
Starting the game you’ll find yourself having the choice between 4 classes having 2 different heroes each. Not much at all, yet they differ a lot. Tank, Healer, Crowd Control and pure Melee DD. Playing some matches you’ll soon realize that everybody has their own strength and mixing classes is the key to winning. 5 players are the maximum per match and the difficulty of the monsters scales with the number of players. Haven’t got a healer? Tank gets wasted. Haven’t got a CC? Happy Bosses will use their abilities to pound your party into dust. So what is the aim of every match? You and your teammates must protect a missile silo I already mentioned above. Defensive towers and small turrets are there to aid your crew but do not rely too much on them. Wave after wave mobs will get stronger, some special waves will "introduce" some badass bosses, willing to crush your crew and your missile silo. Killing mobs rewards you with gold. Be happy about that, you’ll need it to buy special items at the local shop, boosting your abilities or granting you new ones. MOBA-veterans already know that stuff.
 
So..no other team? Beware, the AI is hard. The first match seems to be easy but after boosting the difficulty you’ll find yourself wasted more than once. It’s really rewarding and after finishing a 10-wave-match, which takes around 30 mins in pro league, you get that "victory-feeling" you might only know from PvP games. After the match is before the match..wait what? There is something really special, called "The Path to Glory". It’s like a skill tree with special passive bonuses getting unlocked forever, like heroes start with more gold, bruisers have more health or get better healing, DDs boost their crits etc. You have to perform certain actions to unlock those perks like revive 25 fallen heroes, get attacked 5000 times, survive the 10th wave in Pro-League and so on. Besides that there is not much left at the moment. 8 Maps, a bunch of difficulties, choice between waves or endless mode. Host your own server, play with friends or join another match, it’s up to you.
 
[h1]Big Text, Quick Facts:[/h1]
 
[b]Pro:[/b]
[list]
[*]Great Steampunk Setting
[*]Nice soundtrack and ingame narrator
[*]Different classes - choice matters
[*]Unique heroes - choice matters, again
[*]Huge amount of special items, weird names, funny games
[*]Unlocking perks motivates for future matches, allowing you to boost the difficulty
[*]Smart AI, expect to be challenged
[*]Play with friends or play alone
[*]Teamwork is rewarded!
[/list]
 
[b]Con:[/b]
[list]
[*]Although PvE is very very challenging - no PvP.
[*]Small amount of maps, only wave - or endless-mode available until now
[*]Bosses will start to get repetitive after doing some matches in a row
[*]Lobby needs more players (go buy this game now^^)
[*]Not a real con, but you’ll be forced to play a class sometimes you may not like that much. But having 5 DDs or tanks (Bruisers) will lead to a fail
[*]Item-list might look overwhelming at the start (you will get used to it)
[/list] 


[h1]Summary:[/h1]

Check it out, this game will cost you 9,99. It delivers hours of team and class-based fun with some fresh heroes, items and black humour. I know that the amount of maps could be bigger right now but i am sure that this game will get bigger the more support it gets. Those of you still thinking that only PvP can be a real challenge - we will meet in Apocalymptics Mode. Enough said. Get this game, add me to your friendlist and let’s crush some outsiders together.
9/10, more content would make it full score.
[code][i]If you like reviews about indie games, consider joining [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/indiestructible]INDIEstructible[/url] and follow [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41972991/]my curations[/url].

author: {'steamid': '76561198047221877', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1430656858}
review:
MOBA+TDなゲームです。ウェーブ毎に多数の敵がタワーに向かってくるので、敵を味方全員で殺しまくりコア（ミサイルサイロ）を守るゲームです。
発想は悪く無いと思うんですが、いかんせんボリューム不足です。クラスが４つあり、各クラスに2体ずつキャラがいます。なので計８体。マップは多数ありますが、基本やることは変わりません。
一日で基本あきると思いますので、セールの時に仲の良いフレンドと一緒にやろうみたいな感じで買うならオススメです。一人だとオススメできないかな。

author: {'steamid': '76561197993772367', 'num_games_owned': 499, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 556, 'last_played': 1462549889}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970329288', 'num_games_owned': 2788, 'num_reviews': 1451, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1429816051}
review:
Think of a single or Co-Op version of Dota or League of Legends without all the trash talk! Now I'm not a sports fan, in fact I hate most sports games. Now looking at this title I bet your scratching your head? Well, the good news is... it's not a sports game, in fact its more like a single/co-op Dota or League Of Legends.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xNsd_WN5L9E

Bloodsports.TV is a co-op top-down Hero Defense game. In this spin-off set in the world of Krater, take on waves of incoming enemies and bosses in this old school, fast-paced approach to strategic co-op games. Protect the glorious Missile Silo - locked on and ready to be fired at villages for a fresh supply of volunteers. 

Team up with your friends and form a murderous crew from a variety of Gladiators, each with their own unique abilities and styles. Shoot, smash, stomp, electrocute, drain and melt your enemies (and occasionally heal your allies) to become a legendary Gladiator. Achieve higher scores and climb global leaderboards with your friends to become the greatest crew of Gladiators in the world. - Highly Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198165236215', 'num_games_owned': 8496, 'num_reviews': 275, 'playtime_forever': 1737, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1734, 'last_played': 1470233122}
review:
10个小时以后，我给9/10
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
首个dlc还免费，就这份诚意值8.5/10了
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
dlc更新后汉化已不可用，等更新吧
[strike]D版的汉化可用，可联机可解锁成就，就传了下：
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1rYi0Q[/strike]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
不太会玩这种游戏，没玩过dota之类的游戏深感玩得一头雾水，习惯FPS的键位用右键移动+攻击又玩得好错乱，然而那棵rank of glory树诱发了我的兴趣……总之玩起来就是浓浓的不明觉厉的感觉，质量应该还是很不错的
比较像竞技+塔防类的火炬？不会形容。以后如果有很多有趣的mod的话，有成为热门的潜力
这么高的好评率还是比较客观的
很多技能和武器的特性无法直观的理解，还是希望有个攻略或者汉化……
目前没mod给个8/10

对了，有个小小的BUG，游戏中如果切出窗口的话游戏会自动退出全屏

author: {'steamid': '76561198018664486', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1430281275}
review:
don't expect to get more than your money's worth. I really like the concept of this game. And it is fun. The problem is that it gets old. Fast. Enemies are always the same. The classes get stale once you figure out a few build combinations. Not enough people play it to find a server you like. The biggest issue is that this is an online-only game and it's laggy WAY more often than it runs smooth (although, disabling shadows really helped with this)

Having said all that... it's only 10 bucks. So, for the price, everything here (bad or good) is perfectly acceptable. If this were a $20 game or higher... then no, I wouldn't recommend it.

things I especially like:
-the swedish vibe (character names, etc)
-the announcer's voice (reminds me a bit of Robbaz)
-art style
-freedom to build characters however you like, and still be mostly effective

author: {'steamid': '76561198028159733', 'num_games_owned': 697, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 996, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1472597403}
review:
"I'm about to go dunk this moose"

Insanely fun survival / defense game with a MOBA playstyle. 

I honestly cant believe I've never heard of this game. It's concept is amazing. For 10$ its so worth the price. Even if the game has a small pool of content, the amount of fun you can have with it is incredible.

The devs seem to be pretty patching it rather regularly and listening to what the community wants. Right now they're taking suggestions for items in the next patch.

The first few games you have to play a limited wave game mode, but this isnt a bad thing. I tried out all of the different archetypes and learned the mechanics of the game over the course of these games. Once you've gotten a few achievements down the "path of glory" progression system, you'll unlock the Endless game mode. THIS is where I really started enjoying the game. I've always been a fan of making stupid builds in MOBAs, and in endless, you really get to see whatever crazy build you can come with shine. There's a pretty wide assortment of items in the game already, and on top of that you can buy implants for 1000 gold which take up no space in your inventory but add permanent stats.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979898947', 'num_games_owned': 540, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1434306215}
review: I may not have a whole lot of time into this game, but that will change. This is essentially a team-based moba shooter. Plays like DOTA, feels like Boarderlands. Great game all around. May not have lasting appeal for some, I can see that, but for me it's what I'm looking for.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010684947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2035, 'last_played': 1431263030}
review:
Does anyone remember hero defense maps on Warcraft III? This is pretty much the exact same thing, with a slightly better system and a different skin.

Pros: It's viscerally fun, it's bloody, requires a bit of teamwork.

Cons: Not many classes, Endless mode is just the same 10 waves over and over, the item store is a little hard to navigate at first, and around the 3rd iteration it becomes nigh impossible to continue unless everyone specced to defense.

If you can pick it up for cheap, it's a nice time sink for a while.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018990627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1532726830}

author: {'steamid': '76561197963431726', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 6640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3419, 'last_played': 1513293377}
review:
Take League of Legends, take Diablo/WoW boss fights and mix them with Borderlands' universe and you get Bloodsports.TV

Defend your missile silos against waves of AI-controlled mobs and bosses, buy new equipment and level up as the enemy grows stronger.

Pros :
+ Fun and addictive
+ Very intuitive, specially if you've already played other MOBAs like LoL/DotA/HoN
+ Cooperation oriented but can also be played alone
+ Cool music with some 80's / 90's vibe
+ The ability to join games on the fly
+ Above average graphics
+ All characters play and feel different

Cons :
- Clunky engine with some lack of optimization
- Repetitive
- Can become boring once you've completed the Path to Glory
- Only 8 characters
- Only 6 maps with no real incentive to play any other than Pharma Initiative
- The shop's interface needs to be reworked

This game is made for you if you like MOBAs but can't deal with the PVP communities. It shows great potential and I really hope the devs will add some content to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000996257', 'num_games_owned': 1239, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1499012888}

author: {'steamid': '76561198029390738', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1475127450}
review:
This is a great, cheap game if you like cooperative games. This is put simply, is DOTA or League of Legends without the PVP. It takes all the stress and insults out of the two, and creates a wonderfully fun Co-op MOBA experience. Instead of other players/champions, there's LOTS of creeps, heroes, and bosses. The heroes and bosses have abilities similar to the ones you have and that you'd find in a MOBA game, to keep combat interesting. If you have a few friends and enjoy a good Co-op horde/defense game, this one is fantastic.

Pros:
* Good visuals
* Entertaining gameplay
* Large map and difficulty selection
* Good amount of items and combinations
* Runs well and no glitches yet
* Interesting and unique champions
* Good amount of enemy types
* Can host games with ease (No VPNs or dedicated server hosting)

Cons:
* Only 2 champions per Class
* Can lack replayability 
* Small community
* No in game voice chat or callouts
* Only one skin per champion/lack of personalization 

Definitely worth it for the price, total steal for anything less in my opinion. 7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198000995539', 'num_games_owned': 728, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1430918346}

author: {'steamid': '76561198052278126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 1911, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1834, 'last_played': 1475282956}
review:
This game is great for MOBA fans who are looking for a PvE experience. Great co-op action killing waves of enemies. The gameplay is really solid and fun. There are currently only a few bosses in the game who appear on every map and only 8 characters to play.

Still with its minor flaws, I would highly recommend Bloodsports.TV, it's a lot of fun and will keep you coming back to unlock the next achievement and set a new high score.

UPDATE! Community is basically dead and no updates in a long time. A great game if you have friends to play with, otherwise pass.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063012520', 'num_games_owned': 5170, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1534610524}
review:
操控的方式 跟 DOTA 一樣
但這遊戲的模式是 COOP 防守 而不是對戰
遊玩人數也不少, 很容易能找到公開場進
但最好還是找幾個朋友一起玩

遊戲可以選擇不同的難度, 愈高難度對合作的要需愈高
可玩性不低
另外有一個挑戰(成就?)系統, 完成一個條件就能獲得永久的獎勵
耐玩性也不錯

但目前遊戲推出不久, 英雄,地圖,裝備的數量比較少
期待更新能拿來更多的內容

author: {'steamid': '76561198156499202', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1066, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1430911048}
review:
7/10
  +画面质感不错
  +罕见的类dota游戏单机玩法
  +可以和朋友一起联机

  -角色选择较少 对于一个上g的游戏 内容简直有点少

author: {'steamid': '76561198067380537', 'num_games_owned': 607, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 632, 'last_played': 1432697681}
review:
7.2/10

+不俗的画面和另类的画风
+界面通俗易懂
+需要团队合作的联机游戏
+需要解锁的技能树，有一定分支选择

-怪物重复率极高
-后期极其单调
-主持人疯狗一样的乱叫对于投入在战斗中的我犹如负能量

1.建议组队且有语音的情况下游戏
2.合理配置队伍，1坦2控1奶1DPS和3DPS2奶是两个游戏
3.不要玩无尽模式，后期就是玩命堆叠属性buff而已，极其无聊
4.网络似乎本身就不好，我开Vpn和不开都卡的要命

以上。
本周的HB周包过均价中含有。

author: {'steamid': '76561198127348098', 'num_games_owned': 500, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1430475886}
review:
1.游戏手感非常赞
2.设定类似lol，所以我入门超快（笑），玩dota经常看不懂装备解释（苦笑），所以我大胆说一句游戏对于新人很友好（凑表脸）
3.玩了两个ad英雄，技能很爽快，感觉技能的设定对于pve还是很合理的，但是对于pvp可能过于imba，需要阵容的限制。
4.人数过少，需要新地图，新模式。
5.风格类似无主之地，喜欢蒸汽朋克和moba的朋友不要错过。
6.对了ctrl+技能升级的设定好亲切（泥垢）
最后进包游戏非常值！
希望有好友入，我带你们飞！
最后的最后宣传群113159244，群里最近都在玩gta5，一起来玩。

author: {'steamid': '76561198077624633', 'num_games_owned': 7620, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 8144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2022, 'last_played': 1437004722}
review:
Bloodsports.TV est dynamique et jouissif mais vite ennuyeux si l’on y joue seul. Le jeu étant quand même basé sur la coopération, il est vivement recommandé de jouer avec une bande de potes afin d’élaborer des stratégies et de communiquer sur tel ou tel focus à avoir. Jouer avec des inconnus n’est pas déplaisant non plus, mais le manque de communication dans le lobby vous forcera souvent à prendre un gladiateur en fonction des joueurs qui rushent leur personnage et verrouillent instantanément leur choix.

Avec une excellente durée de vie en multijoueurs, Bloodsports.TV est un jeu à avoir si vous êtes un fan du genre, ou bien, à la recherche d’un jeu de coopération plus ou moins exigeant en fonction de la difficulté. 9.99€ n’est pas excessif pour un jeu de cette facture. Les solitaires passez votre chemin !

author: {'steamid': '76561197987687720', 'num_games_owned': 308, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1430859067}
review: I love the CO-OP elements instead of the same old PvP jungling, 5 lanes over and over. I love LoL, but some variety spices it up, just love what I've played. (Played 10-12 hours on friend's account)

author: {'steamid': '76561197995836948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1476177701}
review: It's pretty cool game, a lot different than I thought it would be. Essentially they took the team work of a MOBA and added a defense game with waves like those in dungeon defenders. So far I have only tipped my tow into the game, but as you progress in a match you do the normal buy this weapon to build that weapon etc..... You gain levels and put points in QWER just like a normal moba.... There is also a a good amount of characters with different roles like healers etc,.... As you defeat each wave sometimes you will be thrown a boss or creeps with special attributes that do certain types of damage AOE, DOT, and other single targeted damage. The game itself is pretty fun alone, but you will only get the most out of it playing with friends to utilize the different difficulty and class combos as a whole. The game seems to run pretty good and doesn't look like so cartoonish. I would say the art style is that of borderlands ( which isn't a bad thing at all ). Would I recommend this game ? Yes..... Because those people who have friends that play mobas and just want to play a different take on it will enjoy it..... Those who never played a moba will also be able to use this game to play with friends to see how they like that genre without having to deal with BS from communities if they are no good. I haven't ran into any bugs and would say the game in it's current state is pretty polished... The bottom line for $10 you're getting a lot of content from a genre that has become copy and paste. At least with this you get something some what original at a bargain price!

author: {'steamid': '76561198037101776', 'num_games_owned': 3174, 'num_reviews': 212, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1427476734}

author: {'steamid': '76561198013018974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 992, 'last_played': 1429112786}
review:
Un petit jeu très sympa pour son prix surtout si vous avec moyen d'y jouer avec des amis !
Un univers décalé (un peu genre borderland) que vous apprécierez ou non.
Pour ce qui est du gameplay, on est dans du moba classique, bien que la différentiation/importance des rôles ce fait plus ressentir comme dans un mmorpg (tank,heal,dps..). Quand vous commencez à progresser un peu vous vous rendez vite compte de l'importance de mettre en place certaines stratégies et tout ...
Le système de progression sous forme de succès avec des bonus définitifs est plutôt cool, sinon le petit point noir a l'heure actuel serait le nombre limité de personnages (8 - 2 par classe) à voir si d'autres sont prévus !
Si vous voulez voir une petite présentation en français du jeu, hésitez pas à regarder notre vidéo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4CAyuArvC7I

author: {'steamid': '76561198001849291', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 485, 'last_played': 1428776952}
review:
lolとかDota楽しいけど対人だとたまになんかギスギスしてるし、なんだかなぁと憂いてる人におすすめなゲーム
いわゆるMOBAタイプのゲームですがPvEメインで作られてるので殺伐としてないところがgood
購入アイテムも沢山あるので上記2ゲームのように自分のキャラクターを自由にビルドできて楽しいです。

まだ、簡単な難易度でしかプレイしていませんがPvEとはいえそれなりに歯応えのある作りで面白いです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198123731064', 'num_games_owned': 1234, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1459216179}
review: A crazy, bloody MOBA style wave survival with every character being like a pyscho from borderlands and the enemies are the same. I would recommend. I got it from a gift from my friend. It is only $9.99 for one or $24.99 for a FIVE pack. I would recommend getting the five pack because you can spread the love and joy that comes from Bloodsports.TV. Plus on the five pack you are only paying for 2 and a half copies, plus you would be a nice friend to those people.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130853477', 'num_games_owned': 497, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 6583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4640, 'last_played': 1449899021}
review: 这几天一直在玩，手感还不错，就是联机的时候那延迟简直感人啊，经常掉线就是了，或许是我自己的网络有问题吧......游戏模式就那样，等于是防守吧，一共就六张图，除了一张没有野怪外，其他图都是有的，不停地刷刷刷啊刷刷刷，人物一共就8个，下面那两个都是皮肤，那皮肤就只是换了个配色而已（你好歹换个武器装备模型也好伐）。。。坑啊，每个类型的两个角色各有侧重点（那不废话），话说我都是玩的右边的额。。。还有就是，这游戏人物看起来咋这么像《末日余痕（Karter）》里面的呀。。。最后吐槽下医生的荣誉好难刷啊~~~

author: {'steamid': '76561198178293861', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1429306662}
review:
The game plays like the coop mode of any moba, it's you and some people (Or alone) against waves of enemies. Where as the coop mode in a moba would pit you against AI bots of other heroes this is purely just wave defense. It's fun with friends and the easier difficulties are rather easy while the harder difficulties get much harder a lot faster. Simply put, it's a couple hours of fun at a time since after 2 me and my friend started getting bored of the game but we will probably play it again during some down time in the future.

My one gripe is that there are only 8 people to choose from, 2 dps, 2 tanks, 2 crowd control, and 2 healer classes. While they are all pretty cool and unique I do hope they add more in the future, one of the great things about mobas in general is you get all those characters to choose from that it takes a long time before it gets stale. That is where this game fails in my opinon. It is still however a really fun game with friends for the price. Just maybe don't expect to get hundreds of hours of gameplay out of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000321818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2158, 'last_played': 1431057627}

author: {'steamid': '76561198023891933', 'num_games_owned': 86, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1428091335}
review:
Alright so... since I've got the chance to try out this game I'm going to give out my fair impression on this game. This was the first MOBA style game that I've ever played so I can not compare it with other moba's out ther... however I do have my doubts that this game will succed with all the competition. As a tower defense game it's pretty great... the tutorial get's you aquinted to the game in no time, and you are able to play it even with 0 experience like me. The graphics are pretty stilish and so is the music. Also as a multiplayer game, this game is definitely something that you should enjoy with your friends not alone like me. The narrathor's voice acting was quite cool, and did give the sensation of being on stage. Anyways, I did do a small first look/let's play video on this if you aren't convinced of my words: https://youtu.be/-gqP7l3WfOg
All in all, it's a pretty decent game, unless you are already playing other MOBAs... a subjective 4/5 is my rating...

author: {'steamid': '76561198140781964', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1429635884}
review:
优点：动画渲染，初感受类似lol与无主之地的结合体。朋克末日颓废风格，没有魔法只有科技，给人清爽的感觉。战斗节奏快，带入感极强。技能效果华丽又不过分，装备系统也是类似lol比较完善。具体来讲玩法最接近我之前在浩方上面玩war3的【守护雅典娜】这张rpg地图，满满的回忆，游戏又很有激情，根本停不下来。

缺点：英雄平衡性较差，不过目前仅有pve模式，影响不太大，不知道以后会不会有pvp，那是怎么改英雄.英雄数量偏少，目前仅有16位。最多仅支持5人联机也有很大的发展空间，以后会不会出支持10人的raid pve模式？？pve模式中怪物（包括野怪）种类太少，就那么几种换来换去，技能也不会变，这是很致命的一点，也是目前游戏最大的缺点！！！

如果后续更新或者dlc解决了上述问题，那么9.99美元超值！！！

PS. we wanna more kinds moods & more kinds enemies!!!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198035421724', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 478, 'last_played': 1431353686}
review:
To me Bloodsports.TV is a unique game. It mixes diferent genres into one game in an interesting way. It has the moba elements in which you have a shop to buy upgrades and level up your abilities upto 4 levels each and sort of jungling elements.

The gamemodes available are certain number of waves with a boss at the end of the run and endless mode where you keep on fighting till you lose your base.

It has the typical MMO holy trinity, tank, healer, dps and also the crowd control classes. From what I have experienced so far you will need 1 of each class to succeed unless there are super crazy people with builds and skills that can pull off a certain group setup.

There are a good number of maps to play on. There is an overall progression tree or ranking system on which you level up depending on what class you are playing with. For example healing for a total of 25k hp ranks you up on the healer progression path and so on. Also there is a leaderboard for the hardcores who like to climb up the rankings.

Haven't played  it much but I am planning on playing it more. Game is enjoyable even while running with random people. From the matches I played the community seems friendly and I hope it stays that way.

Game is recommended if you are looking for a good co-op pve game.

review:

Haven't played the higher levels yet, but so far a fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077517870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1428389684}
review:
스타 유즈맵이나 롤 좀 해봤으면 어려움 없이 즐길 수 있는 협동 디펜스 게임.
아직은 7개 맵의 반복 플레이와 난이도 설정, 그리고 8개의 챔피언 뿐으로 게임의 볼륨이 크진 않은 편이지만 차차 패치를 통해 나아질 것으로 믿는다.
한국인 유저가 많이 있는지는 의문. 체널 검색을 외국서버까지 하면 멀티도 편하게 잡을 수 있다. 게임 플레이에 특별히 대화가 많이 필요하진 않고 핑이나 좀 찍어주는 정도로도 충분하기에 멀티에도 언어의 문제는 적은 편. 외국 서버에서 롤한다고 생각하면 된다. 10달러 가치는 충분히 하는 게임.
체팅도 지금은 영어지원밖에 안하지만 더 늘어나길 바람.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972195564', 'num_games_owned': 2671, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 1167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 646, 'last_played': 1629259728}
review:
Do you like playing League of Legends, but only really enjoy co-op? Then you are going to love this game.

It's a bunch of MOBA-esque things, like building items, the top-down view and QWER abilities, but instead of going against another team you're fighitng against hordes of mobs. Surprisingly difficult, but an absolute blast to play with other people. Plenty of unlockables as you play on harder difficulties and work your way up the ladders with your favored characters, each of which have different flavors that are all neat in their own way.

And that five pack is just so damn affordable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089789358', 'num_games_owned': 596, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1557597593}
review: По мне, так это новое дыхание в жанре MOBA. Довольно интересная игра получилась, с интересной графикой, стилем и оформлением. Надеюсь, что сделают перевод на русский. Тем, кто играет в Dota 2 наверняка понравится данная игра, потому что она похожа по стилю. Но все же, здесь все свое. Основное задание, это защитить ракету до ее запуска от различных мобов и боссов, которые будут наступать волна за волной. Волн может быть до 10 штук. Так же появляются боссы, которые имею очень много способностей, способные убить всю твою команду за раз (если вовремя не убежать из поля действия способности). Так же есть лагеря (можно и так назвать) крипов, где можно немного подфармить в перерыве между волнами. Есть мини-босс лось, который имеет в запасе много урона и здоровья, его лучше убивать всей команде. Насчет команды. В ней должен быть хиллер, хотя бы один, потому что он может изменить игру колосально, повернуть победу лицом в вашу сторону. Чуть не забыл, опыт распределяется на всех, так что по уровню вы не будете сильно отставать, если конечно не будете рядом бегать и помогать. Здесь, все что связано с опытом, саппортингом убрано напрочь, здесь важен геймплей и командная игра. Набор героев играет очень важную роль, так как если понабрать одних стрелков без хиллера и танка, то такая команда врядли до волны пятой продержится. Вообщем, кто играл в бетку (ключ можно было получить недавно, но уже поздно) советую купить игру. Мне лично все равно, будет она потом бесплатной или нет, купил её чтобы поддержать разработчика. Почему бы нет? Пусть делает перевод игры на русский :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198002734128', 'num_games_owned': 3358, 'num_reviews': 928, 'playtime_forever': 752, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1499893169}
review:
It's more fun to play this game via co-op (it supports up to five players at a time), but is fairly enjoyable as a single player experience.  Essentially, it's a cross between a MOBA and tower defense game.  It's like the former in the sense that you'll choose a character (there are four characters for each of the four classes, each with different skills) and start at level 1 at the beginning of each match.  As you level up, you can put points into your four skills and buy new items to place into your inventory.  Instead of fighting other heroes, you'll be fending off waves of enemies (where the tower defense bit comes into play) who are trying to get to your missile silo.  As you play a particular class, you'll level them up in a "path of glory" tech-tree/xp tree-esque system which unlocks different buffs and the like.  Not as hardcore or complicated as say, "League of Legends", but it scratches that MOBA itch in a pinch.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zy5rIFsJSA0

author: {'steamid': '76561198151152171', 'num_games_owned': 545, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 621, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 433, 'last_played': 1580889663}

author: {'steamid': '76561197960288196', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 690, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 690, 'last_played': 1428071164}
review:
Great game! 
It's basically a coop moba with bosses. Choose a hero, choose a map, choose a difficulty, beat waves of enemies, earn gold and xp to level your hero and buy items in the shop. Get stronger over time through the path to glory challenge tree.
I especially like that it has permanent progression, difficulty scaling with # of players and easy server setup and management.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041994859', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1476185809}
review:
[b]BloodsportsTV[/b] – неплохая кооперативная МОБА, в которой не грех провести пару тройку вечеров с друзьями, без нареканий к внешней, звуковой или даже геймплейной составляющей. Однако, из-за отсутствия ПВП-режима, а также при наличии небольшого количества персонажей и карт, для долговременных посиделок игра однозначно не подойдёт. Хотя, подобных целей у [b]BloodsportsTV[/b] и не было. 

Так что, если вы ищите весёлую, стильную, оптимизированную, простую в освоении МОБА, без нарочитой серьёзности, со ржачными персонажами и явным закосом под тимплей – то бегом за покупкой [b]BloodsportsTV[/b]. Тем более, при её небольшой цене в 6,99 долларов, и при 10-типроцентной скидке для владельцев Кратера, позволить её сможет абсолютно любой.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010854361', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1462971346}
review:
Too simple, too little.
You'll find better hero defense style games elsewhere.

The premise has always been simple: Each player grabs a hero, and starts killing the incoming waves, defending one or more central structures, while managing time, inventory and a few skills.

And Bloodsports brings nothing new to the table.
And that's just it. There's nothing new. This is nothing that hasn't been achived in various other games as mods. It's simply a standalone version with it's own price tag.

The heroes in this game (10 of them) each have 4 buttons to press, each rather simple in implementation: self-buffs, power attacks, teleports and so on. Again, nothing new.
And so goes the list of each feature: Quite nice, but nothing new and exciting.

Final verdict: Grab another game with a Hero Defense mod/map. That will bring you the same game + whatever the basis game brings.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008062676', 'num_games_owned': 868, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1428049125}
review:
A spin on the old classic Hero Defence popularised in Warcraft 3. The game truly plays best in a group as unlike previous Hero Defence games you can’t just stack all agility and solo the whole game. There’s a good variety in items and heroes to use, with a decent number of maps to keep things from getting to stale. You also have to do combat with elite and boss minions who actually reward skill through dodging abilities and using your abilities and classes effectively. In saying that the bosses are quite bland and poor AI and pathing leads some silly situations.

Outside of the core gameplay there is some humour and some callouts to the original game “Krater”. There is some external progression that is a little questionable but it being a PVE game is can get away with it. There is an endless mode and a leaderboard so there really is never ending content if that’s your kind of thing. I highly advise to get your friends into this game or make some, it can be hard at times to find people. 

I can recommend it, especially at this price (yo that 5 pack :O). It’s a nice PVE multiplayer experience that is really lacking today in the gaming scene. 

Also if I see someone call this a MOBA one more time…

Here's some Gameplay/Impressions on the Game https://youtu.be/NyFxTi-ac6I

author: {'steamid': '76561198007454965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1428193206}
review:
VERY fun! The game is VERY easy to learn, and VERY easy to play. However, It is very difficult to master.

If you want to screw around with your friends and have fun, this is the game for you!

If you are a more serious gamer, this game is also VERY challenging with over 10 difficulty levels.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057908025', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1427820943}
review:
Played the tutorial and one game, it's pretty solid for an up and coming game, there are some issues for me in terms of stutters but that's probably due to my crappy laptop. 

Looking forward to further developments of this game. More power to you guys specially to the support team that's pretty active here, you guys have been on top of all the issues posted so far. 

One thing I'm definitely looking forward to is the PvP, a different map will probably be called for that one though. 

Once I manage to secure a much sturdier computer, I will play the living shit out of this game. I've read this before but League of Legends graphics mixed with Borderlands theme on top of a Warcraft 3 game mode is what a lot of people familiar with those game are seeing, I agree with them but I believe the innovation to actually make that work well together is what makes this a strong contender and a fun game

author: {'steamid': '76561198040308115', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1428124682}
review:
This game is immensely fun! It's the kind of game that gets progressively harder as it goes on. The difficulty keeps the game interesting while the progression system seems very polished. 
There are many classes to choose from each with their own unique abilities. This allows you to change up your playstyle and explore the different progression trees.

The theme seems very "Borderlands meets Fallout" inspired; with weapons and armor made from scrapped post-apocalyptic symbols and signs. Lots of shards of metal or allusions to nuclear fallout. 

I highly recommend you check this game out, it's worth it.

- Toaomb

author: {'steamid': '76561198017108434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1427830285}
review: Even in this game I can't escape teemo.... The scouts code Item aswell as the blowdart which builds into it. *Facepalm* Besides that though, this is a pretty great game for the 10$ price tag. If you have friends it is an even greater reason to all get this and play it together in 5 player Co-Op mayhem. Reminds me of my old days of playing Wc3 hero defense type maps. Love it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011722552', 'num_games_owned': 537, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1432160130}
review:
A very fun PvE MOBA styled game based in the world of Krater. A nice varaiety of characters to choose from with an array of maps to choose from, being a nice change from the same maps in DOTA and LoL. The enemies may be very similar although Bosses can be a challenge (especially if played in solo). The game is best played in Co-Op due to the difficulty of the levels, however the more payers you have, the harder the level will be. 

Fatshark are also very much behind the game so I'm hoping that support for the game will continue and more features/heroes/maps will come in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974576589', 'num_games_owned': 636, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1428009805}
review:
I had so much fun with Hero defense maps in Warcraft 3 ( X Hero siege, Enfos and so on ) so I bought this game to give it a try...
And I don't regret it ... grab your friends, play it in coop and you'll have alot of fun!
It's just like the hero defenses I loved in Warcraft 3 but has an unique setting (post apocalyptic sweden)

currently there is enough content to have alot of fun for a long time... but I hope they will add something new in the future to keep me interested. Mabye new heroes, maps, skins or whatsoever!

But still it's an awesome game for a low price... so you should PREPARE YOURSELFS.... FOR THE BLOODSPORTS!

author: {'steamid': '76561198012573357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 6246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5595, 'last_played': 1518257095}
review:
Waveごとにワラワラ湧いてくる敵を倒しつつ
各地点にある装置を防衛
ラストWaveに出てくるBOSSを倒せば勝利
装置をすべて破壊されると敗北

１クラス2名（ロックされてるのはスキンぽい）
４クラス計8人のキャラクタ
買い物タイムあり、アイテム９０種、スキルは４つ
お金を貯めアップグレードしていく。

実績があり、条件をクリアするとキャラ強化ボーナス、
称号、スキンなどがアンロックされる

ゲームの長さは4Wave（BOSS数１）7Wave（BOSS2)
10Wave（BOSS3)　エンドレス
難易度も細かい調節が可能
参加人数は５人まで、PVPは無し、PVEのみ

ただサーバーが表示されない
自分がホストだと入ってくれる人がいるのだが。
※追記
ワイドサーチが反映されるようになってました、まぁまぁ遊べます

今のところ適当にガチャガチャやってるけど割と楽しい
今後のアップデートに期待
日本人が皆無な気がするので誰かやりませんか

author: {'steamid': '76561198065038350', 'num_games_owned': 564, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1439169132}
review:
Хил валялась у стены и нервно закидывалась какими-то колесами, прощелыга с электроружьем молился своим богам, моё лицо, да что там, все моё тело было в крови и внутренностях трижды клятого лося и тех двох, которым повезло меньше. Их тела лось разорвал и разбросал по всей комнате. Кровавый микелянджелло и его кровомясная сикстинская капелла. Я был зол, я был в отчаянии. 
Вдруг голос из рупора возвестил о том, что пришел мэр. Я схватил дубину в одну руку, хила в другую и ринулся в бой. 
ЗЕМЛЯ ГОРЕЛА, С НЕБА ПАДАЛИ ХОЛОДИЛЬНИКИ, МЭР СМЕЯЛСЯ И РАССТРЕЛИВАЛ НАС. КРОВЬ ЗАЛИЛА МНЕ ГЛАЗА, ЗАЩИТИТЬ ВЫЖИТЬ НЕ ДАТЬ СОРВАТЬ ЗАПУСК РАКЕТЫ, ПУСТЬ ТЕКУТ РЕКИ КРОВИ, СТОЛЬ ХРУПКИ НАШИ ЖИЗНИ, НО ВЕЧНА СЛАВА ГЛАДИАТОРА.

Первое, что я увидел очнувшись - удаляющийся шарик света, глазами я отыскал хила, на её мертвом лице застыла умеротворенная улыбка, недалеко валялся стрелок, он истерично смеялся, сжимая в своих дрожащих руках почти уже дотлевшую сигарету. Очередная славная победа.

З.Ы. Мне очень понравилась игра, понравилось все: итемы, способности, персонажи, музыка, стандартные хоткеи, единственное что, ХОТЕЛОСЬ БЫ ПИВИПИ =((

author: {'steamid': '76561198066080757', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 193, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1427901699}

author: {'steamid': '76561198038761507', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1427792374}
review:
A very fun co-op PVE Arena defense type game. Not exactly a MOBA but I can see some similarities, but not much. It's more along the lines of  Sanctum without the need to build towers as the towers are already on the map when you start. Also minus the whole FPS thing. But I highly recommend Bloodsports TV, particularly if you enjoy the Krater universe as it is based in that world.

I have only played a few matches and I can see the potential in the game and can safely give it a 7 or 7.5 out of 10.  There are many things I think they could do to improve the game, but the core gameplay is good and fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998178815', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 3445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2268, 'last_played': 1690281287}

author: {'steamid': '76561197989392129', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1427940702}
review:
Classic Hero Defense like old WC3 custom games.  4 classes 2 chars for each and a lot of items to buy.  A familiar face if you are familiar with the Krater game.  Overall its pretty good, solid controls, smart cast, and decent replayability.

Only con is there are not many mobs/bosses so you will fight the same ones over and over.  If they add some new ones and add a couple more characters game could be great with a group of 4-5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063966042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1195, 'last_played': 1427851634}
review:
I don't play much MOBA, so my POV is from a newbie MOBA style player. BTW, this is not competitive game, no competitive at all, only co-op. If you wanna get this thinking of playing competitive then forget bout it.

What I like:
The game is very easy to understand
Map is not big
No hidden places (everything visible on your map)

What I don't like:
Games are local-host, if the host disconnected at 9/10 wave, that's it, the game ends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008216226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1427868082}
review:
It's like playing dota but without the stupid random teammates who ruin your games. But if you miss getting pub stomped in dota, you can kick up the difficulty and the AI will do it for you.

10/10 would destroy villages again.

review: Kinda came into the game with low expectations, but my god its fun as hell, very pleased with the game so far. I am speciffically liking how the progression system works and how its integrated with the steam achivements

author: {'steamid': '76561197964133280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 868, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1431804451}
review: If you like WC3 maps such as X-Hero Siege, Enfo and the likes then you will definitely like this game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076497231', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1084, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1084, 'last_played': 1428109970}
review: Buy it just if you are searching for fun. The game is just released and it can entertain you for endless hours. Launch, pick a class and have fun, simple as that, when you grab some experience you need just to jump to a higher difficulty league and have more fun. The game is simple, you just need to defend your HQ from good people trying to save their homes, but there are A LOT ways to do that, the classes can play totally different from what items you pick and the comp of your party changes it even more. And last but not least there is a competitive board - yes... a PvE game can be competitive :P - and you will grab yourself trying to climb it! Believe me :3

author: {'steamid': '76561197997456071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 436, 'last_played': 1694578933}
review:
A fun hero defense game that can be played both alone or with up to other 4 players, with a diverse item system and several maps with several different dificulty levels. I highly recommendy to anyone who likes Co-op games and/or Warcraft 3 & its multiple custom game modes (like me).

(This Not a MOBA, its' purely PvE, it only plays in a slightly similar way due to the controls, but this is just because, like MOBAs, this game is inspired by a Warcraft 3 type of map, Hero defense. MOBAs came from the AoS map type.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198031964445', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1455067698}
review: I will Be streaming this tomorrow for sure. Mirrormasktv on twitch

author: {'steamid': '76561197989433794', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 449, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 428, 'last_played': 1430815225}
review:
Bloodsports is a cool PvE MOBA style game.

Bloodsports aims to be a very team based game, I think this is great and found it worked pretty well in most public games (I normally picked a champ to fill the gaps though, most often as tank).

However bloodsports may not appeal to you if you want to be the "solo team carry" kind of guy, especially in the top leagues.
If you want to get anywhere in bloodsports then you will need a touch of skill, but most importantly a good team combination, if you have that you its great fun.

TLDR:
Fun PvE MOBA, but be warned, if you do push into the higher leagues you will need a touch a skill, and a little team co-operation.

Edit: Public games get old pretty fast, but still great fun with a couple of friends, and for the price tag its still an ok game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043630917', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1427786389}

author: {'steamid': '76561198042449359', 'num_games_owned': 622, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1589, 'last_played': 1596443395}
review:
This is a really fun action pve game which ramps up the difficulty whenever more players joins in the slaughterfest. You and up to four other players are simple fighting off wave after wave of enemies with classes that makes you feel like you are rambo walking up in the front tanking everything or standing in the backline blasting away with all your moves
And the thing i love the most about this game is the announcer, from the voice acting to his comments it just fits perfectly in.

this game is worth the price and will give you hours of fun whether you play alone or with other players
